31a2(mdo sde): stobs de dag gis de mi smod do// gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ ci bu mo khyod stobs 'di lta bu dang ldan nam/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ldan te gang mnyam pa nyid kyis ldan no//
31a3(mdo sde): gang mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par gnas so// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang mnyam pa nyid 'di ni stobs ma yin/ nyam chung ba ma yin te/ de ni mnyam pa nyid do// gang mnyam pa nyid de la
31a4(mdo sde): ni tha dad du bya ba cung zad kyang med do/ / mnyam pa zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' ste/ chos thams cad ni nam mkha' dang mnyam mo// ji ltar na nam mkha' snang ba med cing bla gab med pa de bzhin du//
31a5(mdo sde): chos thams cad kyang nam mkha' ltar snang ba med cing bla gab med pa'o// gang de ltar mnyam pa de ni nyam chung ba yang ma yin/ stobs dang ldan pa yang ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang btsun pa shA ra dwa
31a6(mdo sde): ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' gang nyam chung ba de ni stobs dang ldan pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang nyon mongs pa nyam chung ba de ni ye shes kyi stobs dang ldan pa'o// gang ser sna nyam chung
31a7(mdo sde): ba de ni/ sbyin pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'o// gang ngang tshul ngan pa nyam chung ba de ni tshul khrims kyi stobs dang ldan pa'o// gang gnod sems nyam chung ba de ni bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'o//
31b1(mdo sde): gang le lo nyam chung ba de ni brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang ldan pa'o// gang g.yeng ba nyam chung ba de ni bsam gtan gyi stobs dang ldan pa'o// gang 'chal pa'i shes rab nyam chung ba de ni/ shes
31b2(mdo sde): rab kyi stobs dang ldan pa'o/ / de bzhin du chos thams cad de gang dang gang las byang chub sems dpa' mi dge ba nyam chung ba de dang de las de dge ba'i stobs dang ldan pa'o// de
31b3(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo rin chen la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ bu mo legs so legs so// ci ste bstan pa lta na de ltar bstan par bya'o// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub
31b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' lnga brgya bzod pa skyes so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ bu mo rin chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
31b5(mdo sde): stobs bcu po de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo rin chen la 'di skad ces bka
31b6(mdo sde): stsal to/ / bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ theg pa dman pa 'dod cing / bya ba ma yin pa byed par 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas ma yin te skabs med do//
31b7(mdo sde): de yi dam la brtan pa'i stobs 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song nas gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs thob ste/ gnas la yang gnas dang / gnas ma yin
32a1(mdo sde): pa la yang gnas ma yin par yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang po ste/ stobs de thob pas de bzhin gshegs pa
32a2(mdo sde): 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog ste/ khyu mchog gi gnas su dam 'cha' zhing / dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gang gis kyang
32a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro/ / bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ rang gi las las gyur pa
32a4(mdo sde): las kyi rnam par smin pa las rton pa yin te/ de las kyi rnam par smin pa'i stobs 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las dang las yang
32a5(mdo sde): dag par blangs pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa gnas dang rgyus yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gnyis pa ste/ stobs de thob pas de bzhin
32a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog ste/ khyu mchog gi gnas su dam 'cha' zhing / dge sbyong ngam bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gang gis kyang
32a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro/ / bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ sems can rnams kyi
32b1(mdo sde): dbang po la brtags nas chos ston te/ de dag shes nas dbang po rnams ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug cing / dbang po rnams ji lta ba dang ldan te de dbang po'i rim pa mkhyen pa'i stobs 'di dang ldan pas
32b2(mdo sde): byang chub thob pa na/ sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag gi dbang po dang brtson 'grus kyi rim pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pas
32b3(mdo sde): gang sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag gi dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi rim pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gsum
32b4(mdo sde): pa'o/ / bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ sems can rnams kyi khams la 'jug ste/ zhugs nas sems can rnams kyi mos pa ji lta ba dang
32b5(mdo sde): khams ji lta ba bzhin du gnas so/ / de khams la 'jug pa'i stobs 'ang dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ khams du ma dang / khams sna tshogs pa'i 'jig rten yang dag pa ji lta
32b6(mdo sde): ba bzhin du rab shes pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bzhi pa'o/ / bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sprad pa spyod pa na/ sems can mos pa tha dad pa
32b7(mdo sde): rnams kyi mos pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes kun tu tshol te/ de ltar mos pa la mi smod do// de mos pa'i stobs 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na/ sems can gzhan rnams dang
33a1(mdo sde): gang bag gzhan dag gi mos pa du ma dang / mos pa sna tshogs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs lnga pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang
33a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po thams cad
33a3(mdo sde): du ye shes gtong ngo / / de kun tu 'gro ba mkhyen po'i stobs 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na kun tu 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
33a4(mdo sde): stobs drug pa'o/ / bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin lhur len pa yin te/ sems nges par rtog cing
33a5(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa dang bral te dul zhing cang shes so/ / de cang shes kyi stobs 'di dang ldan pos byang chub thob pa na/ sems can gzhan rnams dang gang zag gzhan dag gis bsam gtan dang
33a6(mdo sde): rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
33a7(mdo sde): rab tu shes pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bdun pa'o/ / bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ sngon gyi rgyu las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
33b1(mdo sde): chud mi gzon te/ bag yod pa yin/ sngon dam bcas pa las mi nyams pa yin no// de sngon gyi rgyu las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chud mi gzon pa'i stobs 'di dang ldan pas byang chub
33b2(mdo sde): thob pa na/ bdag dang sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag gi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa
33b3(mdo sde): 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs brgyad pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ sems can gang yang spa klong bar mi byed la/
33b4(mdo sde): ma bslabs pa la dbang mi za zhing / sems can thams cad la snang bar gyur pa yin no// de snang ba'i stobs 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na/ lha'i mig gi shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin/
33b5(mdo sde): tu rab tu shes pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dgu pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ sems can gang gi zag pa 'phel ba'i phyir
33b6(mdo sde): yang gnas pa ma yin gyi/ zag pa zad par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston te/ zag pa 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin gyi/ zag pa med pa'i lam gyis sems can rnams la lam nye bar
33b7(mdo sde): ston to/ / de mos pa zag pa med pa'i stobs 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ zag pa thams cad zad pa mkhyen pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 'di ni/ de bzhin
34a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu pa'o/ / bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ste/ byang chub sems dpas de dag rdzogs par byas nas/ stobs bcu dang
34a2(mdo sde): ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ / bu mo de lta bas na byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rab tu dbye ba 'di dag thos nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
34a3(mdo sde): bcu po 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ ci nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la 'jug par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das la bu mo rin chen gyis yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
34a4(mdo sde): 'das gang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po 'di dag dge ba gang dag dang ji ltar ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
34a5(mdo sde): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rab tu thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu mo 'di la byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ gzhan gyis shes par
34a6(mdo sde): mi bya'o snyam nas/ slob dpon nam yang chos kyi dpe mkhyud mi byed de/ sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa yin/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing chos mnyam pa nyid du
34a7(mdo sde): mthong ba yin/ tha dad pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba yin te/ de byang chub thob pa na seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs te/ nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas pa la/
34b1(mdo sde): chos 'di lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so zhes/ 'dir nga la dge sbyong ngam bram ze 'am/ lha'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am su'ang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang mthun pas
34b2(mdo sde): rgol bar 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / / mtshan ma de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba brnyes/ 'jigs pa med pa brnyes pa dang /
34b3(mdo sde): mi 'jigs pa brnyes pa yin te/ 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog cing / khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che ste/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/
34b4(mdo sde): tshangs pa'am/ gang gis kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba 'di ni/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi jigs pa dang po'o// bu mo gzhan
34b5(mdo sde): yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ bar du gcod pa la bar du gcod pa'i chos su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te de bar du gcod pa'i chos la mi ston to// /
34b6(mdo sde): mi 'jug go// mi spyod do// gzhan dag la yang mi 'chad do// mi ston to// bar du gcod pa'i chos su shes nas spong ngo // de byang chub thob pa na/ seng ge'i sgra sgrogs te/
34b7(mdo sde): gang nges bar du gcod po'i chos su gsungs pa de dag la sten pa la ni/ bar du gcod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i gnas med de/ 'dir nga la gang yang rgol bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin te/
35a1(mdo sde): 'di ni mi 'jigs pa gnyis pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ rtag tu rgyun mi chad par dkar po'i chos la mos
35a2(mdo sde): yi te/ rnam par byang ba'i lam du zhugs shing / sems can thams cad la rnam par dag pa'i chos ston te/ yon tan gyi chos nyid mngon sum du gyur pa yin no// yan lag gi tshogs gang dag
35a3(mdo sde): gis rnam par byang ba/ rnam par dag pa'i lam gnon par 'gyur ba'i yan lag gi tshogs de dag la bdag kyang spod/ sems can gzhan la yang ston to// de byang chub thob pa na/ seng ge'i
35a4(mdo sde): sgra sgrogs te/ gang ngas rnam par byang ba/ rnam par dag pa'i chos su gsungs pa de dag la bsten pa la ni rnam par dag pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i gnas med do// 'dir nga la su'ang rung rgol
35a5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ snga ma bzhin te/ 'di ni mi 'jigs pa gsum pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spong pa na/ bdag gis shes
35a6(mdo sde): shing mthong gi/ gzhan gyis mi shes mi mthong ngo // zhes mngon pa'i nga rgyal du nam yang mi ltung ste/ rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mngon pa'i nga rgyal med cing sdig pa 'byed pa blo sbyangs pa
35a7(mdo sde): yin no/ / de chos kyi sbyin pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na/ seng ge'i sgra sgrogs te nga zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas pa la/ zag pa 'di lta bu zhig yongs su ma zad do zhes bya ba de lta bu'i
35b1(mdo sde): gnas med de 'dir nga la su yang rgol bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin te/ 'di ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spod pa na
35b2(mdo sde): rtag tu rgyun mi chad par lam stor ba'i sems can rnams la/ lam 'tshol bar byed de lam gyi gam yo nas/ mtho dman mi mnyam pa mnyam par byed do// zam pa dang rdo stegs kyang 'odogs so//
35b3(mdo sde): mtshan mo mun pa mun nag gi nang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me yang 'bulo// sems can ltung ba'i 'gyod pa la gnas pa rnams kyi ltung ba'i 'gyod pa'i sel to// kun nas ltung
35b4(mdo sde): ba med par byed do/ / gzhan gyi 'gyod pa mi skyed do// gzhan gyi ltung ba byung ba phreng bar mi byed do// chos la dogs pa skyes pa'i sems can rnams la dogs pa thams cad bcod pa'i phyir
35b5(mdo sde): chos ston to/ / the tsom dang yid gnyis dang / nem nur med par byed do// chos kyi snang ba sgrub po// shes rab kyi snang ba chen po yang dag par skyed do// sangs rgyas dang byang chub
35b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' dang / chos smra ba thams cad la chos bstan par gsol ba 'debs te/ chos yang dag par 'dzin cing rgyu med pa'i legs so zhes bya ba brjod do// sems can gang la yang
35b7(mdo sde): mi 'bya'o/ / mthing mang mi byed do// chos la shing mi 'byed pa dang / sdang ba dang / mag myos pa dang / mongs par byed do// skye bo'i nges pa'i tshig la nga ba yar
36a1(mdo sde): do/ tshig thams cad sangs rgyas kyi gsung du mos so// yi ge gsog dang / yi ge stong pa nyid kyi tshig tu brjod pa thams cad la skyon du lta ba ma yin no//
36a2(mdo sde): 'khrul pa'i skabs tshol ba ma yin no// de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na/ 'khrul pa med pa zhes bya ste/ dris pa thams cad lung bstan pa ston pa
36a3(mdo sde): dag la de la de med cing / kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu sgoms pa'i phyir/ sgra skad thams cad du 'jug pa'i gzungs la mkhas pas/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par de bzhin gshegs
36a4(mdo sde): pa 'khrul pa med pa'i tshig gis chos ston pa yin te/ thams cad du khyad par lung ston pa 'di ni/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang po'o// bu mo gzhan
36a5(mdo sde): yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ tshig gi skyon thams cad spangs pa yin te/ bden pa smra/ chos smra/ don smra/ 'dul ba smra zhing / mu cor mi smra/
36a6(mdo sde): byubyang rgyal du mi smra ste/ 'phags pa ma yin pa'i gtam thams cad spangs nas/ 'phags pa'i mi smra ba thob cing / dge sbyong gi chos kyi bya ba rtsod pa med pa la zhugs te/ chos gang nyan cing
36a7(mdo sde): yongs su tshol ba dang / gzhan la yang ston pa de dag thams cad bdag dang / gzhan dag zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i bsam pas yongs su tshol lo// rtsod pa med pa lhur len pa'i phyir/
36b1(mdo sde): de su dang yang mi 'thab mi rtsod do// dgrar mi tshol lo// dgra med pa'i chos la mos pa yin no// brjod du med pa'i chos rnams la 'jug go// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes lhun gyis
36b2(mdo sde): grub pa la mngon par dad do/ / sems can gzhan yang chos nyid 'di yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go// de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ ca co med/
36b3(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ste/ de la de med pa yin no// de yi ge 'bru gcig kyang mi brjod cing mi smra la/ sgra skad thams cad kyang / nges pa'i tshig gis bstan pa dag la yang lhun gyis grub pa nyid du legs
36b4(mdo sde): par bshad pas/ 'khor tshim par byed do// rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang / sgo mtha' yas pa bsgrub pa'i gzungs la mkhas pas de bzhin
36b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i gnas thams cad dang / mtshan thams cad dang / dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / spu'i khung bu thams cad nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sgra dbyangs bsam gyis mi khyab
36b6(mdo sde): pa 'byung ste/ tha na sgra gcig gis kyang 'khor thams cad kyi sems tshim par byed pa'i chos kyi sgo dpag tu med pa bstan pa 'byung zhing / sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyis brlabs dang / ye shes
36b7(mdo sde): kyi stobs kyis de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par mi rtog cing btang snyoms te/ lhun gyis grub pa 'di ni/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gnyis pa'o//
37a1(mdo sde): bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyang pa spyod par 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'du
37a2(mdo sde): rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa'i rjes su dran pa drug po dang mi 'bral ba yin no// sems can gzhan yang rjes su
37a3(mdo sde): dran pa 'di dag yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/ / de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyel ba med pa zhes bya ste/ de la
37a4(mdo sde): de med pa yin no/ / chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang / chos kyi sgron ma'i gzungs la mkhas pas/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par de bzhin gshegs pa
37a5(mdo sde): la bsnyel ba med pa'i chos can yin no/ / gal te sems can thams cad kyis bskal par bsams te snga phyi med par the tsom dri ba tha dad pa de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su dris kyang / de
37a6(mdo sde): 'di bshad do/ / 'di bstan to snyam du mi sems mi rtog la/ rtag tu ma rmongs shing dran pa'i dbang pos/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig la legs par bshad pas/ sems can
37a7(mdo sde): thams cad tshim par byed pa 'di ni/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gsum pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa
37b1(mdo sde): spyod pa na/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par pha rol gyi sems srung ba yin te/ gzhan gyi sems 'khrug par mi byed/ sems gdung bar mi byed/ sems dmigs par mi byed/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar du gcod par mi byed
37b2(mdo sde): chos la dmigs par mi byed cing / chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur mos te/ g.yo ba med/ rlom sems med cing sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa yin/ chos mnyam
37b3(mdo sde): pa nyid du mthong ste/ chos kyi dbyings 'brel pa med cing ro gcig pa la zhugs pa yin no// de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na/ sems bskyed pa gcig
37b4(mdo sde): tsam yang mnyam par ma bzhag pa med pa yin te/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang / kun nas 'khyil pa'i sgo
37b5(mdo sde): gzungs la mkhas pas/ mnyam par bzhag cing lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa 'di ni/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i
37b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bzhi pa'o/ / bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ phyin ci log gi 'du shes med pa yin te/ sems phyin ci log
37b7(mdo sde): med/ lta ba phyin ci log med/ med pa la slo 'dogs pa'i phyin ci log med pa yin/ bdag tu 'du shes pa ma yin/ sems can du 'du shes pa ma yin/ srog tu 'du shes pa ma yin//
38a1(mdo sde): gso bar 'du shes pa ma yin/ gang zag tu 'du shes pa ma yin/ shed las skyes par 'du shes pa ma yin/ shed bur 'du shes pa ma yin/ chad par 'du shes pa
38a2(mdo sde): ma yin/ rtag par 'du shes pa ma yin/ 'byung bar 'du shes pa ma yin/ 'jig par 'du shes pa ma yin/ dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha nam
38a3(mdo sde): tho ba med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang /
38a4(mdo sde): 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la gnyis su 'du shes pa ma yin la/ 'du shes la chags shing zhen pa'i sems can rnams la 'du shes phyin ci log spong bar ston kyang che ba dang /
38a5(mdo sde): tha dad pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba ma yin/ mthar lta ba thams cad rnam par spangs te/ dbu ma'i lam la zhugs pa yin/ chos mnyam pa nyid mthong ba yin no// de chos yang
38a6(mdo sde): dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa zhes bya ste/ de la de med pa yin no// mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
38a7(mdo sde): shin tu bsgoms pa dang / mi zad pa'i za ma to gi gzungs la mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma med pa'i gnas la gnas kyang / mtshan ma thams cad la 'du shes kyis
38b1(mdo sde): 'dzin pa dang / rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po mi ldog ste/ sems can 'dul ba'i dus la yang rub cing / chos ston pa'i rgyun yang mi gcod pa 'dra/
38b2(mdo sde): ni bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa lnga pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ rtag par rgyun tu btang
38b3(mdo sde): snyoms pa yin te/ 'khor ba na spyod pa'i nyon mongs shing / sdug bsngal ba'i chos thams cad la de btang snyoms pas bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi gnas kyi chos la rjes su chags
38b4(mdo sde): pa yang med/ sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba'i gnas kyi chos thams cad la khong khro ba yang med de/ de rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang bral bas don thams cad rnyed cing
38b5(mdo sde): 'byor kyang / khengs par mi 'gyur/ don thams cad yongs su nyams kyang gdung bar mi 'gyur gyi/ 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal bar so sor mi rtog cing bdag med
38b6(mdo sde): pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes mos pa/ btang snyoms pa yin no// sems can gzhan yang btang snyoms kyi chos nyid de lta bu yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go// de chos yang
38b7(mdo sde): dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa zhes bya ba ste/ de la btang snyoms de med pa yin no//
39a1(mdo sde): gnyis la chags pa las rnam par grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin du 'jug go// de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
39a2(mdo sde): la so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa zhes bya ba/ de la btang snyoms de med pa yin no// gnyis la chags pa las rnam par grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang / rgya
39a3(mdo sde): mtsho'i phyag rgya'i gzungs la mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye
39a4(mdo sde): chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis bstod cing bsti stang du byas te/ mchod cing ri mor byas kyang rjes su chags
39a5(mdo sde): pa med/ bdud dang gzhan mu stegs can dang / phas kyis rgol ba dang / 'tshe ba can gyi sems can thams cad kyis dkrugs shing / gnod par byas kyang / khong khro ba med la/ sems
39a6(mdo sde): mtshungs shing mnyam pa yin te/ phan 'dogs pa dang / gnod par byas pa las dang mtshungs pa'i sems dang / chu dang mtshungs pa'i sems dang / me dang mtshungs pa'i sems dang /
39a7(mdo sde): rlung dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis khengs par mi 'gyur/ gdung bar mi 'gyur zhing mi 'khrugs te/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis mnyam pa nyid du sbyor zhing sems can thams cad
39b1(mdo sde): la btang snyoms par gnas pa yin no/ / de chos nges par sems pa'i btang snyoms 'di dang ldan pas/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po mi ldog ste/ sems can 'dul ba'i dus/
39b2(mdo sde): la yang rub cing ci rigs par chos ston pa'i rgyun yang mi gcod pa 'di ni/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa drug pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
39b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'dun pa drag pa yin te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su tshol ba la/ 'dun pa rlabs po che dang / 'dun pa chen
39b4(mdo sde): po dang / 'dun pa zab mos dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs bskyed par 'dun to// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su spong bar 'dun to// theg pa chen po las phyir mi ldog par
39b5(mdo sde): 'dun to/ / sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po btang ba yid la byed pa mi 'dor bar 'dun to// rang gis rtog cing sgrub kyi/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog par/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
39b6(mdo sde): yang dag par sgrub par 'dun te/ bdud dang / gzhan mu stegs can dmigs pa can lta ba la mngon par zhen pa thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyis de 'dun pa de las 'dun pa dang
39b7(mdo sde): dpral bar mi nus so/ / de chos yang dag par blangs pa'ang dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'dun pa nyams pa med pa zhes bya ste/ de la de med pa yin no//
40a1(mdo sde): 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'du byed kyi ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang / rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyi gzungs la mkhas pas/ dbang bsgyur ba'i phyir chos thams
40a2(mdo sde): cad kyi nang nas/ gang bstan par bya ba de ston to// gang du skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis dus gang dang / nyi tshod gang dang / yul gzhan gang dang / sems can gyi sems kyi rgyud gang
40a3(mdo sde): dang / gang la snod ji lta ba bzhin du ci rigs par chos ston kyang mnyam par bzhag pa'i gnas kyang mi 'dor ba 'di ni/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bdun pa'o// /
40a4(mdo sde): bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spad pa spod pa na/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin te/ rtag tu brtson pa mi 'dor/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
40a5(mdo sde): yang dag par bsgrub cing / sbyor bas ngoms mi myong / byin gyis brlabs pa'i rtsom pa la rtul cing bla ma dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / chos smra ba dang / sangs rgyas dang /
40a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gan du 'gro la yongs su 'dri ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / mchod pa'i las dang / bskal pa tshad med par 'khor ba yongs su gzung bar bya ba dang /
40a7(mdo sde): sems can tshad med pa yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su sbyang ba dang / sangs rgyas tshad med pa la mchod cing rim gro bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad
40b1(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par gzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba dang / sems can gyi spyod pa tshad med pa la 'jug par bya ba dang / sangs
40b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa bstan pa la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir/ des brtson 'grus de tshad med par byas pa yin no// de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na/
40b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa zhes bya ste/ de la de med pa yin no// brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / 'du byed kyi ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pas/
40b4(mdo sde): sems can tshad med pa gzung cing / gdul ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa/ khyu mchog tu gyur pa/
40b5(mdo sde): tshad med pa ston kyang de'i rdzu 'phrul de/ chags pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ thogs pa med par sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ste/ mngon par phyogs kyang mngon par
40b6(mdo sde): 'du byed pa med cing / thams cad du rgyu ba nam mkhas klas pa 'di ni bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
40b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i spad pa spyod pa na/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par dran pa phun sum tshogs shing dran pa dang / shes bzhin mchog dang ldan pa yin te/ de'i dran pa de brjed pa med pa yin
41a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa yin no// de nang gi lus la lus kyi
41a2(mdo sde): rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa'i rnam pa yid la byed cing sbyor ro// phyi'i lus dang / phyi nang gyi lus la
41a3(mdo sde): lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor ro// nang gi tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i
41a4(mdo sde): rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor ro// de bzhin du phyi'i tshor ba dang / phyi nang gi tshor ba rnams la/ tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ stong pa'i
41a5(mdo sde): rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor ro/ / nang gi sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor ro// phyi'i sems dang / phyi nang gi
41a6(mdo sde): sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor ro// nang gi chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ smon pa med pa'i rnam par
41a7(mdo sde): yid la byed cing sbyor ro/ / phyi'i chos dang / phyi nang gi chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor ro// lus la zhugs pa'i dran
41b1(mdo sde): pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom ste/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yongs su
41b2(mdo sde): bsgrub pa'i phyir/ lus kyi las legs par sbyor ba'i rgyun yang mi gcod do// tshor ba la zhugs pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom ste/ stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor yang
41b3(mdo sde): ngan song thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can rnams la lta bas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad rgyun gcod pa'i phyir/ sems can de dag la snying rje chen po'i rgyun yang mi gcod do// sems la
41b4(mdo sde): zhum pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom ste/ mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor yang byang chub kyi sems kyang mi brjed la theg pa chen po'i tshogs yang dag par sgrub pa'i rgyun yang mi gcod
41b5(mdo sde): do/ / chos la zhugs pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa sgom ste/ smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor yang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid kyang mngon sum du mi byed la/
41b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos dang yang mtshams pa yin te/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa la yang dag par 'jug go// de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob
41b7(mdo sde): ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la dran pa nyams pa med pa zhes bya ste/ de la de med pa yin no// spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pas/ de bzhin gshegs
42a1(mdo sde): pa kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul gyis/ sems can thams kyi mngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa dang /
42a2(mdo sde): dbang po dang khams dang / mos pa gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa dang / nyon mongs pa spyod pa bag chags dang / bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / kun nas dkris pa dang /
42a3(mdo sde): dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa dang / tshe dang 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa dang / bskal pa dang /
42a4(mdo sde): zhing dus sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa dang / nyan thos 'dus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa lung bstan pa gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa dang / pha ma dang /
42a5(mdo sde): nyen du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa bstan pa la dran pa'i dbang po thogs pa med cing / rmongs pa med pa yin te/ thams cad du khyad par lung ston pa
42a6(mdo sde): 'di ni/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dgu pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ rtag tu rgyun mi
42a7(mdo sde): 'chad par shes rab spyod pa yin te/ shes rab kyi 'od dang / shes rab kyi snang ba dang / shes rab kyi spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dang / rno ba'i shes rab dang /
42b1(mdo sde): zab pa'i shes rab dang / nges par rtogs pa'i shes rab kyi/ mi thul ba'i shes rab dang / zil gyis mi non pa'i shes rab dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams
42b2(mdo sde): cad kyis gting dpag dka' ba'i shes rab dang / yangs shing rgya che la sems snyoms pa'i shes rab dang / lhag pa'i shes rab dang / bdag tshul bzhin yid la byed kyi gzhan
42b3(mdo sde): gyis ma bstan pa'i shes rab dang / thos pa tshol bas ngoms mi myong ba'i shes rab can te/ thos nas kyang shes rab kyis khongs su chud cing rtogs te/ mgo'amathong pa la me
42b4(mdo sde): 'bar ba bzhin du bsti stang du byed cing thos pa tshol ba thos pa snying por byed pa yin/ thos pa bsags pa yin/ chos 'dod cing chos kyi kun dga' la dga' ba mos pa yin/ dam pa'i
42b5(mdo sde): chos yongs su tshol ba la brtson pa yin te/ de chos 'dod pa des phyi nang gi dngos po gang yang yongs su mi gtong ba med do// de bla ma la rim gro bya ba mi byed pa gang yang med do// de sdug
42b6(mdo sde): bsngal gyi phung po mi bzod pa gang yang med do/ / de bde ba'i yo byad mi 'dor ba gang yang med do// de chos 'dod pa des tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig nyan pa la shin tu dga' ba yin
42b7(mdo sde): te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po ches yongs su bkang ba la ni ma yin no// chos kyi tshig gcig la shin tu dga' ba yin te/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po thab
43a1(mdo sde): pa la ni ma yin no/ / pha rol tu phyin pa'i la mnyan pa la shin tu dga' ba yin te/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa thob pa la ni ma yin no// tshig bzhi pa'i tshogs
43a2(mdo sde): su bcad pa gcig gzhan dag la ston par byed pa la shin tu dga' ba yin te/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byed pa la ni ma yin no// gzhan la byang chub kyi sems yang
43a3(mdo sde): dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa la ni shin tu dga' ba yin te/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid kad+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed thob pa la ni ma yin no// gzhan dag la pha rol tu phyin pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i
43a4(mdo sde): chos kyi gtam rab tu ston pa la dka' ba yin te/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag thob pa la ni ma yin no// de lhag pa'i bsam pa de lta bu la zhugs pas bsti stang du
43a5(mdo sde): byed cing chos nyan to/ / bsti stang du byed cing gzhan dag la ston to// de de ltar mngon par btsun pas/ tshogs chung ngur lha thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba yin/ sangs rgyas thams kyis
43a6(mdo sde): dgongs pa yin no/ / de las yongs su bzung zhing / sangs rgyas kyis dgongs pas 'jig rten pa dang / 'jog rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos thams cad bdag nyid la mngon
43a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ba yin no/ / de shes rab kyi snang ba'i gi zang mi shes pas sdang ba yin no// de chos snang ba'i sgo'adi dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la shes rab nyams
43b1(mdo sde): pa med pa zhes bya ste/ de la de med pa yin no// sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa shes pa dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa dang / kha na ma tho ba dang /
43b2(mdo sde): bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang
43b3(mdo sde): 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang / chos kyi sgo thams cad khong du chud cing rtogs pa bstan pa shes pa dang / zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra rab thams cad dang / mnyam pa'i bskal
43b4(mdo sde): pa bstan pa shes pa dag la/ de'i shes rab de thogs pa med cing sgrib pa med pa yin no// de'i shes rab de sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus la chags pa
43b5(mdo sde): med cing sgrib pa med de/ thams cad du thogs pa med do// phyi ma'i mthar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bstan kyang thogs pa med do// dpyod pa'i 'du byed kyi ting nge 'dzin shin tu
43b6(mdo sde): bsgoms pas/ rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgo gcig las/ chos kyi sgo thams cad snang zhing / chos kyi sgo thams cad chos kyi sgo gcig gis yang dag par
43b7(mdo sde): sgrub pa 'di ni/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres bcu pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ rtag tu rgyun mi
44a1(mdo sde): 'chad par khyim gyi gnas don du mi gnyer ba yin/ 'dod pa don du mi gnyer ba yin te/ de mngon par byung bar dga' zhing rab tu 'byung ba mang ba yin/ dben pa la
44a2(mdo sde): gzhol/ dben pa la 'bab/ dben pa la bab cing chos zab mo bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson te/ de stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam
44a3(mdo sde): par thar pa'i sgo gsum po de dag bsgom mo/ / gang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis yul ma yin zhing mi rtogs pa dang / dmigs par blta ba mtshan ma la mngon par dga' ba thams cad kyis
44a4(mdo sde): rtogs par mi 'gyur ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po de dag bsgoms pas/ sgrib pa med pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa kun tu skye'o// chags pa med pa'i shes rab kyi snang ba yang rab tu thob
44a5(mdo sde): ro/ bdud kyi yul las kyang shin tu 'da'o// ye shes kyi yul yang yongs su rdzogs par byed do// sgrib pa dang / chod pa dang / kun nas dkris pa dang lta ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs
44a6(mdo sde): pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad la mi spyod do// de sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa gsum thob cing / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la rnam par rtsen pas/ chos zab mo rton pa yin no//
44a7(mdo sde): don la rton pa yin gyi/ tshig 'bru la rton pa ma yin no// ye shes la ston pa yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa la rton pa ma yin no// nges pa'i don la rton pa yin gyi/ drang ba'i don la rton/
44b1(mdo sde): pa ma yin no// chos nyid la rton pa yin gyi/ gang zag la rton pa ma yin no// sems can thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa yin te/ yi ge dang / rnam par rtog pa la chags// zhe na/
44b2(mdo sde): pa la don la rton pa bstan nas/ yongs su thar par byed do// rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la chags/ zhen pa la ye shes la rton pa bstan nas/ yongs su thar bar byed do//
44b3(mdo sde): drang bar sgro btags pa la chags/ zhen pa la nges pa'i don la rton pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do// gang zag la mngon par zhen cing chags/ zhen pa la chos nyid la ston
44b4(mdo sde): pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do/ / lta bar song ba drug cu rtsa gnyis la chags/ zhen pa la stong pa nyid bstan nas/ yongs su thar bar byed do// rnam par rtog pa'i sgrib pa
44b5(mdo sde): thams cad la chags/ zhen pa la mtshan ma med pa la bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do// khams gsum pa la chags/ zhen pa la smon pa med pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed
44b6(mdo sde): do/ / 'dod chags kyis chags/ zhen pa la mi sdug pa'i rnam par bstan nas/ yongs su thar bar byed do// zhe sdang sprod pa la chags// zhen pa la byams pa bstan na yongs su thar
44b7(mdo sde): bar byed do/ / gti mug spyod pa la chags/ zhen pa la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do// ser sna la chags/ zhen pa la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
45a1(mdo sde): bstan nas/ yongs su thar bar byed do// 'chal pa'i tshul khrims la chags/ zhen pa la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan nas/ yongs su thar bar
45a2(mdo sde): byed do/ / gnod sems la chags/ zhen pa la gzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bstan nas/ yongs su thar bar byed do// le lo la chags/ zhen pa la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
45a3(mdo sde): tu phyin pa bstan nas/ yongs su thar par byed do// g.yeng ba la chags/ zhen pa la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan nas/ yongs su thar par byed do// 'chal
45a4(mdo sde): nga'i shes rab la chags/ zhen pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan nas/ yongs su thar bar byed do// so so'i skye bo rnams la chags/ zhen pa la 'phags pa'i bden
45a5(mdo sde): pa bstan nas/ yongs su thar bar byed do// phyin ci log la chags/ zhen pa la mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba bstan nas yongs su thar
45a6(mdo sde): par byed do/ / sgrib pa dang chod pa dang / kun nas dkris pa dang / ldan pa thams cad la chags/ zhen pa la sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa bstan nas/ yongs su thar bar
45a7(mdo sde): byed do/ / nyon mongs pa thams cad la chags/ zhen pa la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do// de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub
45b1(mdo sde): thob pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol ba nyams pa med pa zhes bya ste/ de la de med pa yin no// de'i rnam par grol ba de mi 'khrugs shing / shin tu mthar thug ste/
45b2(mdo sde): dpa' rlabs med la shin tu bsil ba'i dngos por gyur cing zab ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' ba yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa
45b3(mdo sde): nyid kyi rjes su song ba yin/ dri ma med cing dri ma dang bral te/ rnyog pa med la shin tu yongs su dag pa yin/ zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong gi sa rnams la shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas
45b4(mdo sde): pas zad mi shes pa yin/ bstan pa mtha' yas mu med pa yin/ chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa yin/ nam mkha'i dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba yin te/ dri ma med pa'i snying po'i
45b5(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang / chos thams cad snang ba dang ldan pa'i gzungs la mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid kyi chos bstan pa dang rgyu mthun
45b6(mdo sde): pa yin te/ thams cad las byung zhing / chos thams cad kyi snang ba dang ldan pa yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhol ba yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa la bab pa yin/ mya ngan las
45b7(mdo sde): 'das pa la 'bab pa yin te/ shin tu mthar thug cing / shin tu mthar phyin pa 'di ni/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gcig pa'o// bu mo gzhan
46a1(mdo sde): yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ ye shes lhur len pa yin te/ ye shes kyi stobs dang / ye shes kyi mtshon cha dang / ye
46a2(mdo sde): shes kyi byin dang ldan pa yin no/ / de'i ye shes de ni nyams pa med par 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pa yongs su sbyang ba byas pa las/ nges par byung ba'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
46a3(mdo sde): kyis rnam par dpyod pa'i blo dang ldan pa yin te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par dpyod pa'i blo dang ldan pas/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems la yang / 'dod chags
46a4(mdo sde): dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems la yang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
46a5(mdo sde): shes so/ / de bzhin du zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang / zhe sdang med pa dang / gti mug dang bcas pa dang / gti mug med pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang / nyon mongs
46a6(mdo sde): pa med pa dang / 'khor byed dang bcas pa dang / 'khor byed med pa dang / zang zing dang bcas pa dang / zang zing med pa dang / mchog tu 'dzin pa dang // mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa dang / bla ma dang
46a7(mdo sde): bcas pa dang / bla ma med pa dang / sgrib pa dang bcas pa dang / sgrib pa med pa dang / lung du bstan pa dang / lung du ma bstan pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na
46b1(mdo sde): ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa can dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa can
46b2(mdo sde): ma yin pa dang / rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par ma dag pa dang / chung ngu dang / chen po 'gyur ba dang / mtha' dang bcas pa dang / mtha' yas pa dang / ser sna
46b3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa dang / gtong ba dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal ba'i sems dang / tshul khrims la sbyor ba'i sems dang / gnod sems kyi bag la nyal dang / gnod sems
46b4(mdo sde): med pa dang / le lo dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / g.yeng ba dang / mnyam par bzhag pa dang / 'chal ba'i shes rab dang / shes rab dang ldan pa dang /
46b5(mdo sde): so so'i skye bo'i sems dang / log pa nyid du nges pa dang / yang dag pa nyid du nges pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg par nges pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par nges pa dang / theg
46b6(mdo sde): pa chen por nges pa dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'di ni
46b7(mdo sde): sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba/ 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa/ 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de mi skye ba shes pas
47a1(mdo sde): sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa rab tu shes so/ / shin tu kun tu mi rgyu ba shes pas/ kun 'byung ba rab tu shes so// chad pa med cing rtag pa med pa shin
47a2(mdo sde): tu skad cig pa/ 'gog pa shes pas/ 'gog pa rab tu shes so// thams cad kyi rjes su song ba/ nam mkhar yang dag par 'du ba/ bdag gi ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa
47a3(mdo sde): med pa/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i shes pas lam rab tu shes so// de 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di dag de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes kyang / sems can yongs
47a4(mdo sde): su smin par bya ba'i phyir mngon sum du yang mi byed la/ bden pa yongs su shes pa dang / spang ba dang / bsgom pa dang / mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston to// /
47a5(mdo sde): de'i chos bstan pa de bden pa'i rjes su mthun pa yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / 'gal ba med pa yin/ mthar lta ba thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin/ dbu ma'i lam la
47a6(mdo sde): zhugs pa yin/ rten pa'i chos mngon sum du gyur pa yin te/ de chos thams cad rgyu dang bcas shing / rkyen dang bcas pa'i kha na las kyi bdag gi kha na las pa ma yin/ sems
47a7(mdo sde): can gyi kha na las pa ma yin/ srog gi kha na las pa ma yin/ gso ba'i kha na las pa ma yin/ skyes bu'i kha na las pa ma yin/ gang zag gi kha na las pa ma yin par rab tu
47b1(mdo sde): shes so/ / de ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams su rab tu shes so// 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis/ ming dang gzugs dang /
47b2(mdo sde): ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis/ skye mched drug dang / skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis/ reg pa dang / reg pa'i rkyen gyis/ tshor ba dang / tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa dang / sred
47b3(mdo sde): pa'i rkyen gyis len pa dang / len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa dang / srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba dang / sme ba'i rkyen gyis rga shrI dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug
47b4(mdo sde): bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ba rab tu shes so// de ma rig pa
47b5(mdo sde): 'gag pa nas/ rga shi 'gag pa'i bar dang / de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po sa 'dres pa 'di 'gag par gyur par rab tu shes so// de 'di la yang dag par slob pa na/ gang ma
47b6(mdo sde): rig pa'i rkyen las byung ba de ni/ bdag gi rkyen las byung ba ma yin/ sems can gyi rkyen las byung ba ma yin/ srog dang / gso ba dang / gang zag gi rkyen las byung ba ma yin
47b7(mdo sde): no/ / gang bdag gi rkyen las byung ba ma yin pa nas/ gang zag gi rkyen las byung ba ma yin pa'i bar de ni stong pa'o// stong pa gang yin pa de ni chad pa ma yin/ rtag pa ma yin no//
48a1(mdo sde): chad pa ma yin/ rtag pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni gdong ma ny-id nas sa skyes ma byung ba'o// gdongs nyid nas su skyes/ sa byung ba gang yin pa don+ta/ dus
48a2(mdo sde): gsum du brjod du med do/ / dus gsum du brjod du med pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni bgrang ba med cing / bgrang
48a3(mdo sde): pa las shin tu 'das pa'o/ / bgrang ba med cing / babrang ba las shin tu 'das pa gang yin pa de ni don dam pa'o// don dam pa gang yin pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' yang dag
48a4(mdo sde): pa'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi bka' yang dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'thab pa med cing brtso pa med pa'o// 'thab pa med cing / rtsod pa med pa gang yin pa de ni dge sbyong gi chos so// dge
48a5(mdo sde): sbyong gi chos gang yin pa de ni/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i rang bzhin du des de ltar shes shing gnas te/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa kun 'byung bas/ ma rig pa kun 'byung bar rab tu shes
48a6(mdo sde): so/ ma rig pa 'gag pa nas/ rga shi 'gag pa'i bar du rab tu shes te/ rma dang / rkyen tshogs pa'i shes pas/ chad par lta bar sbyor ba ma yin gyi/ bdag med pa dang
48a7(mdo sde): sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med pa'i chos kyi rjes su ba yin te/ mtha' khas mi len/ nye bar mi 'dzin/ mi dmigs so// mtha' mi dmigs
48b1(mdo sde): pas dbus mi dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // chos gang la mtha' mi dmigs pa de la dbus yod par ga la 'gyur te/ de'i mtha' ci 'dra ba zhig snyam nas/
48b2(mdo sde): mtha' dang / dbung med pa'i chos rnams la 'jug go// chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang / dpung dang bral bas/ mtha' dang dpung med pa'i chos ston pa yin no// de chos yang dag
48b3(mdo sde): par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba nyams pa med pa zhes bya ste/ de la de med pa yin no// stobs
48b4(mdo sde): bskyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang / mtha' yas 'khyil ba'i gzungs la mkhas pas/ de'i rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba de/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang / dpung
48b5(mdo sde): med par yang dag par 'du ba yin/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa bstan pa rnams la/ nam mkha'i dbyings ltar rgya che zhing rnam par mi rtog la/ lhun gyis grub pa yin/ 'das pa dang /
48b6(mdo sde): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa shes pa bstan pa rnams la/ rnam par smin pa chud mi za bar ston pa yin/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po dang
48b7(mdo sde): brtson 'grus kyi rim pa shes pa bstan pa rnams la mngon sum du gyur pa yin/ khams dum pa dang / khams sna tshogs pa'i 'jig rten bstan pa rnams la/ shin tu rnam par nges
49a1(mdo sde): par ston pa yin/ mos pa du ma dang / mos pa sna tshogs shes pa bstan pa rnams la mi zad par ston cing 'jug pa yin/ kun tu 'gro ba'i lam shes pa bstan pa/
49a2(mdo sde): rnams la phyogs kyi dri ba thams cad rnam par dbye ba rgyas par byed cing / khyad par lung ston pa yin/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par
49a3(mdo sde): 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / ldan pa shes pa bstan rnams la/ chos kyi sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par gzhag pa ston pa yin/ sngon gyi gnas
49a4(mdo sde): rnamapa du ma rjes su dran pa thog pa med cing she ba bstan pa rnams la/ sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho dang / tshe dang / skye ba rab 'bring tha ma thog ma'i mthar chags pa med cing / sgrib pa med pa'i
49a5(mdo sde): ye shes ston pa yin/ thogs pa med cing sgrib pa med pa'i lha'i mi gshes pa bstan pa rnams la/ kun tu rnam par lta ba thams cad du shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa'i lung bstan pa ston pa yin/
49a6(mdo sde): zag pa thams cad zad pa shes pa bstan pa rnams la/ bag chags kyis mtshams sbyor bar ma lus par spang ba shes pa ston pa yin/ mi 'jigs pa shes pa bstan pa rnams la zil gyis
49a7(mdo sde): mi non pa ston pa yin/ snying rje chen po'i stobs shes pa bstan pa rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad du tha dad du bya ba med cing sbyor ba mtshungs shing mnyam pa/ rgyun mi gcod
49b1(mdo sde): pa ston pa yin/ so so ci rigs par chos bstan pa rnams la/ lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa yin/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed cing
49b2(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i phyir/ mi zad pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i ye shes kyi yul bstan pa rnams la zab mo dang / sna tshogs dang 'phrugs pa dang sbrel zhing rgyu ba dang / shes rab dang
49b3(mdo sde): thabs dang / stobs dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i ye shes ston pa yin/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / thun mongs ma yin pa yin te/ bu mo 'di ni de bzhin
49b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gnyis pa'o/ / bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ ye shes kyis byas pa'i las rnams
49b5(mdo sde): byed kyi/ nga rgyal gyis byas pa rnams mi byed de/ de ye shes kyis lus kyi las byed pa ni 'di lta ste/ 'khu ba dang / g.yo dang / gya gyu dang / tshul 'chos pa thams cad mi byed do//
49b6(mdo sde): sdang ba med cing chags pa med pa yin/ rtag tu tshangs par spyod cing / de lus kyi las kyi brtson 'grus brtsams pas byang chub dang 'thun te/ bdag dang gzhan la gnod pa'i mi byed
49b7(mdo sde): pa yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i snying rje chen po la sbyor zhing / rtag tu sems can gyi don la brtson te/ lus kyi las de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no// de chos yang dag par
50a1(mdo sde): blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing / ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ste/
50a2(mdo sde): de la de yod do// gzugs thams cad kun tu ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang / kun nas snang ba'i gzungs la mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog du
50a3(mdo sde): ma dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / gzugs dang dbyibs dang / chu zheng ston pa'i lus kyis lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
50a4(mdo sde): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs
50a5(mdo sde): rigs dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge snyen ma dang / srog chags brgya stong du ma lhags pa'i 'khor 'dus pa thams cad du spyod lam tshang med pa
50a6(mdo sde): dang / kha dog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs gnas pa/ mchog dam pa gtso bo gya nom pa'i lus bstan nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la chos kyi gtam yang dag par ston to//
50a7(mdo sde): yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go// yang dag par gzengs bstod do// yang dag par dga' bar byed do// yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par
50b1(mdo sde): gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dka' bar byas nas/ mi snang bar byed do// mi snang bar gyur kyang song bar shes pa yang med do// 'khor 'dus pa de dag tu 'dus shing 'dug ste/
50b2(mdo sde): smra 'am cang mi smra ba yang rung / 'ong bar shes pa yang med do// de la lta bas kyang ngoms mi myong ngo // des bstan pa la dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rab tu rgya chen po yang
50b3(mdo sde): rnyed do/ / 'dod pa la dga' zhing rtse ba dang / yul dang / longs spyod thams cad la mi lta ba yid la byed cing sbyor ro// mi snang bar gyur na lta ba dang / mnyan pa'i phyir skom par
50b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / de la lta bas skom pa dang / lta 'dod pa dang / chos nyan pas skom pa dang / chos nyan par 'dod pa de yang / zag pa med pa'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las
50b5(mdo sde): dang yid kyi las thob pa'i rgyur 'gyur te/ bu mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gsum pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems
50b6(mdo sde): dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ ye shes kyis byas pa'i las rnams byed kyi/ nga rgyal gyis byas pa rnams mi byed de/ de ye shes kyi ngag gi las byed pa ni/ 'khu ba dang / g.yo dang /
50b7(mdo sde): gya gyu dang / tshul 'chos pa thams cad mi byed de/ bden par smra zhing phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig 'khyal pa mi smra ba yin/ phan pa'i tshig dang / ran pa'i tshig dang
51a1(mdo sde): chos kyi tshig dang / de'i tshig de dag smras te tshig des bdag dang / gzhan la gdung bar mi 'gyur ro// tshig gang sangs rgyas kyis rjes su snang ba don dang ldan pa'i
51a2(mdo sde): tshig smra ste/ tshig des sems can thams cad tshim par byed do// de mi gshe mi 'tshig ste/ ye shes dang rab tu ldan pa'i tshig dang ldan pa yin gyi/ nga rgyal dang rab tu ldan pa ma yin/
51a3(mdo sde): no// de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes
51a4(mdo sde): bya ste/ de la de yod do// rin po che'i 'byung gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang / 'khor gsum gyi gzungs la mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa ngag gi las ci yang
51a5(mdo sde): mi brjod kyang de skad thams cad las sgra snyan dang / 'khor thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa tshim par byed pa'i sgra byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi gsung sgra dang
51a6(mdo sde): dbyangs ni don dang ldan pa/ chos dang ldan pa/ bden pa dang mthun pa/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang mi 'gal ba/ yid 'byung ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang
51a7(mdo sde): mthun pa nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba 'bras bu yod pa nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyi rgyur gyur pa yin te/ bu mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu bzhi pa'o//
51b1(mdo sde): bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chu sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par ye shes kyis byas pa'i las rnams byed kyi/ nga rgyal gyis byas pa'i las rnam mi byed de
51b2(mdo sde): de ye shes kyis yid kyi las byed pa ni/ 'khu ba dang / g.yo dang / gya gyu dang / tshul 'chos pa thams cad mi byed do// brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta
51b3(mdo sde): ba dang bral zhing yang dag par lta ba yin/ byams pa dang / snying rje la gnas te/ sems can thams cad la sems snyoms shing / byang chub kyi sems brjed pa med pa yin no// de
51b4(mdo sde): ye shes dang rab tu ldan pa'i yid dang ldan pa yin gyi/ nga rgyal dang rab tu ldan pa ma yin no// de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na/ de bzhin gshegs
51b5(mdo sde): pa'i yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ste/ de la de yod do// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin
51b6(mdo sde): tu bsgoms pa dang / brnag pa rnyog pa med pa'i gzungs la mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems gcig gis/ sems can thams cad kyi sems rab tu shes so// sems
51b7(mdo sde): can thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang / sems can thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir/ rang gi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi sems mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud
52a1(mdo sde): pa yin no/ / sems can thams cad kyi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis rang gi sems mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa yin no// lus thams cad gzugs brnyan lta bu'i phyir//
52a2(mdo sde): rang gi chos nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi chos nyid khong du chud pa yin no// sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi chos nyid kyis/ rang gi lus kyi chos nyid khong du chud pa yin no//
52a3(mdo sde): rang gi lus sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi rjes su 'jug cing yang dag par 'du ba yin no// sems can thams cad kyi lus rang gi lus kyi rjes su 'jug cing yang dag par 'du ba yin no//
52a4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi lus/ sangs rgyas kyi skur byin gyis brlob po// de'i byin gyis brlabs de ni/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs par
52a5(mdo sde): bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gang gis kyang / g.yos pa 'am/ bskyod par mi
52a6(mdo sde): nus te/ bu mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco lnga pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ 'das pa'i de
52a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes chags pa med pa thos na/ mos shing yid ches te/ the tsom mi za/ nem nur med cing mi skrag la kun tu mi skrag cing / mi dngang la/ kun tu dang
52b1(mdo sde): bar mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la yang mos pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi lus kyi las dang
52b2(mdo sde): lus kyi spyod lam yongs su dag pa chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad kyi rjes su song ba la mos so// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi
52b3(mdo sde): ngag gi las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa'i dbyangs sgra brjod pa chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra skad dang / dbyangs dang
52b4(mdo sde): chos kyi sgo tshad med pa bstan pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba la mos so/ / 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sems kyi las dus thams cad dang / zhing thams cad dang / sangs
52b5(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad dang / chos thams cad dang / sems can thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'gro
52b6(mdo sde): ba thams cad kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa shin tu rnam par phye ba/ rnam par 'byed pa la mos so// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi 'od zer gyi dra ba bkod pa chags pa med cing
52b7(mdo sde): sgrib pa med pa la yang mos shing yid ches te/ the tsom mi za nem nur med cing mi skrag la/ kun tu mi skrag cing / mi dngangal kun tu dngang bar mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam
53a1(mdo sde): kyis suM khyab pa la yang mes so/ / sems can gzhan byung / mos pa'i chos nyid sa pa d-i sa yang dag par 'dzin sa 'jugs/ chos ya du ra ca/
53a2(mdo sde): pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na/ 'das pa'i dus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba/ chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ste/ de la de yod do//
53a3(mdo sde): dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang / gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i gzungs la mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan tha
53a4(mdo sde): dad pa dang / tshe'i tshad tha dad pa go rims bzhin du brjod pa'i mtha' ni mi rtogs so// de bzhin du 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos rnams dang / rang
53a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams dang / sems can rnams dang / sems can gyi spyod pa rnams dang / sems can gyi spyod pa byed pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa so sor myong ba rnams dang / de bzhin/
53a6(mdo sde): du 'das pa'i bskal pa thams cad de/ bskal pa gang dag sangs rgyas dang bcas pa dag dang / bskal pa gang dag sangs rgyas med pa dag dang / bskal pa gang la de bzhin gshegs
53a7(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed byung ba'i bskal pa de dag go rims bzhin du brjod pa'i mtha' ni mi rtogs so/ / de bzhin du 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
53b1(mdo sde): thams cad kyi ming tha dad pa dang / gang dag kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag dang / gang dag rnam par dag pa dag dang / gang dag chung ba dag dang / gang dag chen por 'gyur ba dag dang /
53b2(mdo sde): gang dag phra ba dag dang / gang dag rags pa dag dang / gang dag rdul phra rab la 'jug pa'i rjes su zhugs pa dag dang / gang dag spyi'u tshugs dag dang / gang dag mthun pa dag dang / gang
53b3(mdo sde): ngag phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams rnam par gzhag pa dang / mig 'phrul rnam par dbye ba la 'jug pa'i rjes su zhugs pa la 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad go rims bzhin
53b4(mdo sde): du brjod pa'i mtha' ni mi rtogs so/ / de la de bzhin gshegs pa lung bstan pa thams cad la rmongs pa med de/ lag mthil dang sor mo lnga mthong ba'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes
53b5(mdo sde): kyis thams cad shes te/ bu mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu drug pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyang pa spyod pa na//
53b6(mdo sde): ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ye shes chags pa med pa thos nas/ mos shing yid ches te/ the tsom mi za/ nem nur med cing mi skrag/ mi dngang / dngangab mi 'gyur
53b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la yang mos pa yin no/ / ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi lus dang / lus kyi/
54a1(mdo sde): las dang / lus kyi spyod lam yongs su dag pa chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad kyi rjes su song ba la mos so//
54a2(mdo sde): ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi ngag gi las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa'i dbyangs sgra brjod pa/ chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa la bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams
54a3(mdo sde): cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra skad dang / dbyangs dang / chos kyi sgo tshad med pa bstan pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba la mos so// ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi
54a4(mdo sde): sems kyi las dus thams cad dang zhing thams cad dang / sangs rgyas thams cad dang / chos thams cad dang / sems can thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang
54a5(mdo sde): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi las kyi las rnam par smin pa shin tu rnam par phye ba rnam par 'byed pa la mos so// ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi 'od
54a6(mdo sde): zer gyi dra ba bkod pa chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa la yang dag par mos shing yid ches te/ the tsom mi za nem nur med cing / mi skrag/ mi dngang / dngang bar mi 'gyur te/ sangs
54a7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la yang mos pa yin no/ / sems can gzhan dag kyang mos pa'i chos nyid rnam pa 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go// de chos yang dag par blangs
54b1(mdo sde): pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing / thogs pa med pa 'jug pa zhes bya ste/ de la de yod do//
54b2(mdo sde): snying rje chen po'o stobs dang / smon lam yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang / seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i gzungs la mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma
54b3(mdo sde): 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan tha dad pa dang tshe'i tshad tha dad pa dang / go rims bzhin du brjod pa'i mtha' ni mi rtogs so// de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems
54b4(mdo sde): dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / sems can rnams dang / sems can gyi spyod pa rnams dang / sems can gyi las rnams dang
54b5(mdo sde): sems can gyi rnam par smin pa so sor myong ba rnams dang / de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa thams cad de/ bskal pa gang dag sangs rgyas dang bcas pa dag dang / gang dag sangs rgyas
54b6(mdo sde): med pa dag dang / bskal pa gang la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i bskal pa de dag go rims bzhin du brjod pa'i mtha' ni mi
54b7(mdo sde): rtogs so/ / de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi ming tha dad pa dang / gang dag kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag dang / gang dag rnam par dag pa dag dang
55a1(mdo sde): gang dag chung ba dag dang / gang dag chen por gyur pa dag dang / gang dag phra ba dag dang / gang dag rags pa dag dang / gang dag rdul phra rab la 'jug pa'i
55a2(mdo sde): rjes su zhugs pa dag dang / gang dag spyi'u tshugs pa dag dang / gang dag mthun pa dag dang / gang dag phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams rnam par gzhag pa dang / mig 'phrul
55a3(mdo sde): rnam par dbye ba la 'jug pa'i rjes su zhugs pa/ ma 'ongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad go rims bzhin du brjod pa'i mtha' ni mi rtogs so// de la de bzhin gshegs
55a4(mdo sde): pa lung bstan pa thams cad la rmongs pa me de/ de lag mthil dang sor mo lnga mthong ba'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis thams cad shes te/ bu mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
55a5(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu bdun pa'o/ / bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye
55a6(mdo sde): shes chags pa med pa thos na/ mos shing yid ches te/ the tsom mi za/ nem nur mi byed cing / mi smrag/ mi dongang / dngang bar mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul
55a7(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa la yang mos pa yin no/ / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi lus kyi las dang / lus kyis spyod la
55b1(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad kyi rjes su song ba la mos so/ / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi ngag gi las 'jig
55b2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa'i dbyangs sgra brjod pa/ chags pa med cing sgrib pa med la/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra skad dang / dbyangs dang / chos kyi
55b3(mdo sde): sgo tshad med pa bstan pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba la mos so/ / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sems kyi las/ dus thams cad dang / zhing thams cad dang / chos
55b4(mdo sde): thams cad dang / sems can thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi las kyi rnam
55b5(mdo sde): par smin pa shin tu rnam par phye ba rnam par 'byed pa la mos so/ / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi 'od zer gyi dra ba bkod pa/ chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa la yang mos shing
55b6(mdo sde): yid ches te/ the tsom mi za nem nur med cing mi skrag/ mi dadung dngang bar mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la yang mos pa yin no// sems can
55b7(mdo sde): gzhan dag kyang mos pa'i chos nyid rnam pa 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/ / de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ da ltar byung ba'i dus la/
56a1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ste/ de la de yod do// shin tu dkar ba dri ma med pa'i phyag
56a2(mdo sde): rgya'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzungs la mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan tha dad pa
56a3(mdo sde): dang tshe'i tshad tha dad pa go rims bzhin du brda sprod pa'i mtha' ni mi rtogs so/ / de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs
56a4(mdo sde): rgyas rnams dang / sems can rnams dang / sems can gyi spong ba rnams dang / las rnams dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa so sor myong ba rnams go rims bzhin du brjod
56a5(mdo sde): pa'i mtha' ni mi rtogs so/ / de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i bskal po thams cad de bskal pa gang dag sangs rgyas dang bcas pa dag dang / gang dag sangs rgyas med pa dag dang / bskal
56a6(mdo sde): pa gang la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed byung ba'i bskal pa de dag go rims bzhin du brjod pa'i mtha' ni mi rtogs so/ / de bzhin du da ltar
56a7(mdo sde): byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi ming tha dad pa dang / gang dag kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag dang / gang dag rnam par dag pa dag dang / gang dag chung ba dag dang
56b1(mdo sde): gang dag chen por gyur pa dag dang / gang dag phra ba dag dang / gang dag rags pa dag dang / gang dag rdul phra rab la 'jug pa'i rjes su zhugs pa dag dang / gang dag gi spre'u
56b2(mdo sde): tshugs pa dag dang / gang dag mthun pa dag dang / gang dag phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnam par gzhag pa dang / mig 'phrul rnam par dbye ba la 'jug pa'i rjes su zhugs pa
56b3(mdo sde): da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad go rims bzhin du brjod pa'i mtha' ni mi rtogs so/ / de la de bzhin gshegs pa lung bstan pa thams cad la rmongs pa med de/ de//
56b4(mdo sde): lag mthil dang / sor mo lnga mthong ba'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis thams cad shes te/ bu mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
56b5(mdo sde): pa'o/ / bco brgyad po 'di dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa thams cad thob ste/ thams cad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus tshad med pa dang / thams cad zil
56b6(mdo sde): gyis gnon cing thams cad du khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir/ spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / lus rtsi sman dang 'dra ba'i
56b7(mdo sde): phyir mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams kyi skyon zhi bar byed pa dang / thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med pas 'khor thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rab tu thob
57a1(mdo sde): pas bag tsha ba med pa dang / yang dag par sbyor bas slob ma bsam pa can dang / gdam dag can dang / rjes su bstan pa dang mthun pas slob ma mi phyed pa dang /
57a2(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la mtshungs par gnas pas/ slob ma shin tu dul ba dang / chos bstan pa la the tsom med pas/ spobs pa myur ba dang / gleng ba med pas sems can
57a3(mdo sde): thams cad tshims par byed pa dang / don yod pa'i chos ston pa dang / gdul bya rnams kyi dbang po yongs su smin pas/ 'khor thams cad rtse gcig tu sems pa las/ sangs
57a4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi sgra skad 'byin pa dang / cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis mngon du blta ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsod nams tshad med
57a5(mdo sde): pas brtan pa'i phyir/ blta bas mi ngoms pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pas 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa dang / spyod lam mi 'khrugs pas/ glang po che'i lta stangs
57a6(mdo sde): kyis lta ba dang / spro ba che bas/ seng ge ltar rnam par bsgyings pa dang / lus kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro bas don yod par rnam par 'gro ba dang / ngag gi las ye shes sngon
57a7(mdo sde): du 'gro bas ngag la dbang ba dang / yid kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro bas/ kun nas mi dang ldan pa dang / spobs pa myur bas bzung bar 'os pa'i tshig dang ldan pa dang
57b1(mdo sde): bla na med pa'i sbyin gnas su gyur pas/ rnyed pa'i mchog dang / grags pa'i mchog dang ldan pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyis klas shing mthas btugs pas bsod nams zad mi shes
57b2(mdo sde): pa dang / sreg med kyi bu chen po'i lus dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa'i mchog thob pas/ rdzi ba med pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang /
57b3(mdo sde): mchog ma yin pa shes pas/ sems can la bde ba skyed pa las mi ldog cing 'khrul pa med la/ brel 'phongs med pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi ston par gyur pas/ chos dang
57b4(mdo sde): bstan bcos mang po shes pa dang / chos kyi skus rab tu phye bas tshe dpag tu med pa dang / shin tu mur thug cing mthas klas pas/ mthong ba dang / reg pa dang / bsnyen bkur
57b5(mdo sde): byas pa dang / dran pa dang / thos pa don yod pa dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pas/ shes rab mi 'khrugs pa dang / chos smra zhing nyes par smra ba med pas/
57b6(mdo sde): gtam rgyun chags pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad ma lus par spangs pas/ bag chags thams cad yang dag par bcom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rang byung bas/ slob
57b7(mdo sde): dpon med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma lus par khong du chud pas/ rnam pa thams cad shes pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 'di dag thams cad rab tu 'thob bo//
58a1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la / bu mo rin chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum phum bcwa
58a2(mdo sde): po 'di dag sngon dge ba'i tshogs gang dag la zhugs na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mngon par grub/ de skad ces gsol pa dang //
58a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bu mo rin chen la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs chang med grangs med pa dag la zhugs pas/ de bas
58a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i skul skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mngon par grub ste/ de dag las cung zad rtsa ma zhig bstan par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
58a5(mdo sde): zhabs shin tu gnas pa 'di ni sngon dam bcas pa la brtan pas mngon par grub bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan zhabs kyi mthil 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa 'di ni
58a6(mdo sde): sngon sbyin pa sna tshogs bsags pas mngon par grub bor/ zhabs kyi rting pa yangs shing / zhabs byin gyis mthong ba ni/ sngon sems can gzhan dag khyad du ma bsad pas grub po
58a7(mdo sde): sor mo ring ba ni sngon sems can rnams chos kyi bsrungs zhing bskyabs te/ sbas pa byas pas grub bo// phyag dang zhabs bra bas 'brel ba ni/ sngon gzhan gyi g.yog 'khor ma phye bas grub po/
58b1(mdo sde): phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa ni/ sngon bsgo ba sna tshogs byin pas grub po// bdun mtho ba ni/ sngon bza' ba dang / btung ba rgya chen po byin pas grub po3/
58b2(mdo sde): byin pa ri dgas e na ya'i lta bu ni/ sngon sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bzung bas grub bo// mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa ni/ sngon gsang ba'i tshig bsrungs shing / 'khrig
58b3(mdo sde): pa'i chos spangs pas grub bo/ ro stod seng ge'i 'dra ba ni/ sngon dge ba'i las rgya chen po mthar gyis spyad pas grub bo1// thal gong rgyas pa ni/ sngon dge ba'i chos yang dag par
58b4(mdo sde): spyad pas grub bo/ 1/ dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa ni/ sngon mi 'jigs pas gzhan dbugs phyung bas grub bo12// ma btud par phyag ring ba ni/ sngon gzhan gyi ci bya'o cog byed pa
58b5(mdo sde): spro bas grub bo23/ sku rnam par dag pa ni/ sngon dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la ngoms mi myong bar yang dag par spyad pas grub bo/ 1mgur dung lta bu ni/ sngon nad pa rnams la sman sna
58b6(mdo sde): tshogs byin pas grub po18/ / 'gram pa seng ge'i lta bu ni/ sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba la sbyor ba yongs su rdzogs par byas pas grub bo7// tshems bzhi bcur tshang ba ni/ sngon sems can la
58b7(mdo sde): bsam pa mnyam par sbyong bas grub bo/ / tshems thags bzang ba ni/ sngon sems can mi 'dum pa rnams kyi sdums byas pas grub bo// tshems mnyam pa ni/ sngon yid du 'ong ba'i nor
59a1(mdo sde): @bu byin pas grub pos/ choms mche ba dka ba ni/ sngon lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyilas shin tu bsrungs pas byung po// sngags shin tu ring ni/
59a2(mdo sde): bden pa'i tshig kun tu bsrungs pas grub bo26// ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa ni/ sngon bsod nams tshad med pas brtan cing yid du 'ong ba'i ro bro ba byin pas grub po dang // tshangs pa'i dbyangs
59a3(mdo sde): dang ka la bing+ga'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan pa ni/ sngon sems can la 'jam pa'i tshig smras pa dang / tshig bsdams pa dang kun dga' ba'i tshig bsgrags pas grub bo'ang// spun mthon mthing
59a4(mdo sde): lta bu ni/ sngon byams pa dang ldan zhing thams cad bsrungs pas grub bo dang // spun gyi rdzi ma ba'i lta bu ni/ sngon bsam pa bcos ma ma yin pas grub bo'ang // dpral ba'i sman mtsham kyi bu shin
59a5(mdo sde): tu dkar ba ni/ sngon bsngags par 'os pa rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod pas grub bo'o// / dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa ni/ sngon bla ma la gus shing 'dud pas grub bo'8// pags pa srab pa ni/
59a6(mdo sde): sngon chos yang dag par sdud pa'i sems can las su rung bas grub bo'ang // pags pa'i mdog gser 'dra ba ni/ sngon yid du 'ong ba'i gos dang / mal stan byin pas grub bo da// / smu
59a7(mdo sde): khung bu nas ba spu re re skyes pa ni/ sngon 'du 'dzi yongs su spangs pas grub bor// spu'i rtse mo g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba ni sngon mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / dge ba'i bshes
59b1(mdo sde): gnyen gyi gdams ngag mthun par 'dzin pas grub boraH/ / dbu sgra in da snyil lta bu ni/ sngon srog chags thams cad la/ snying brtse zhing rdo dbyig dang / mtshon cha bor bas grub bo
59b2(mdo sde): 28/ / shing n+ya gro da ltar chu zheng gab pa ni/ sngon bdag dang / sems can gzhan dag kyang ting nge 'dzin la sbyor bas grub bor8// de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po mtshan sred med kyi
59b3(mdo sde): bu chen po'i lus ltar kun nas mdzes pa 'di ni/ sngon de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed pa dang / mchod rten zhig pa bcos pa dang / gzhan 'jigs pa dag dbugs phyung ba dang
59b4(mdo sde): sems can mi 'dum pa'i sdums byas pas grub ste/ bu mo sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos tshad med grangs med pa 'di dag spyad pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa
59b5(mdo sde): gnyis mngon par grub bo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ bu mo rin chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi rgyu las
59b6(mdo sde): byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las brtsams te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bka' stsal pa 'di ni ngo mtshar to// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo rin
59b7(mdo sde): chen la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / bu mo de de bzhin te/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bstan pa 'di las bstan to// bu mo gang dag nge ba ri gshegs
60a1(mdo sde): pa'i sngon gyi rgyu las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las brtsams te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bstan pa 'di thos la thos nas kyang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa de dag thams
60a2(mdo sde): cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa de dag la ltos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
60a3(mdo sde): dang mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / mtshan rab tu dbye ba bstan pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jigs rten gyi
60a4(mdo sde): khams thams cad rab tu g.yos te/ snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur nas/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// byang chub
60a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' nyi khri lnga stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so/ / steng gi bar snang las kyang lha brgya stong gis me tog gi char rab tu phab ste/ sil snyan yang dkrol nas gang dag de bzhin gshegs
60a6(mdo sde): pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / mtshan rab tu dbye ba bstan pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di thos la thos nas kyang mos shing yid ches te/ 'dzin cing
