210b2(mdo sde): bar gyi bskal pa bzhi bcur mchod pa dang / rim gro bgyis nas/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de bzhin du bdag kyang sems bskyed par bgyi'o// ji ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur
210b3(mdo sde): gyur pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur pa na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa'i rgyal po la mchod pa dang / rim gro rnam pa du ma bgyis nas byang chub tu sems
210b4(mdo sde): bskyed pa de bzhin du bdag kyang sems bskyed par bgyi'o/ / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rdo rje rgya mtsho rgyal po la sti stang bgyi
210b5(mdo sde): nas/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang sems bskyed par bgyi'o// mchog dam pa nga rgyal zhing / sems ma lags pa'i sems dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs
210b6(mdo sde): su bskyab pa'i sems dang / byang chub kyi sems des khyad par ma gyur pa'i chos kyis dbyings de gang yang ma mchis so// byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs des dus gsum
210b7(mdo sde): du ma khyab pa cung zad kyang ma mchis so/ / sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par bgyid pa'i sems dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu dga' bar bgyid pa'i sems
211a1(mdo sde): dang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su yi rang ba'i sems dang / sems bskyed pa des yongs su zin par ma gyur pa'i sems de dag gang yang ma mchis/
211a2(mdo sde): so// mchod par ma gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de gang yang ma bzhugs so// gang du sems bskyed de/ bskyed ma thags pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni rab tu mang gi/ sems can thams
211a3(mdo sde): cad 'khor los sgyur ba dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su gyur pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ni de tsam ma lags so//
211a4(mdo sde): bdag gi bsod nams kyi phung po byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang ldan pa gang lags pa dang / sems can thams cad la stsal pa gang lags pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
211a5(mdo sde): thams cad la phul ba gang lags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phul ba gang lags pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad phul ba'i bsod
211a6(mdo sde): nams kyi phung po yongs su bzung ba gang lags pa dang / gang ye shes dang / mos pa mngon par bsgrubs pa rnams kyi mos pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gang lags pa dang / sangs
211a7(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba dang / ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lhag par mchod pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa
211b1(mdo sde): dang mos pa'i stobs las byung ba'i mchod pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / sgrib par 'gyur ba thams cad sel ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / rjes su yi/
211b2(mdo sde): rang ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la bskul ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bos te/
211b3(mdo sde): bdag gir bgyi ba dang ldan pa gang lags pa dang / bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i thog ma dang po ma mchis pa'i tshe rabs nas bgyis pa thams cad mkhyen par yongs su ma bsngos pa gang lags pa
211b4(mdo sde): dang bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dus byas kyi yo byad 'tshal bas mngon par bsgrubs pa gang lags pa dang / bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i slad du mngon par
211b5(mdo sde): bsgrubs par gang lags pa dang / bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba las kyis bsgrubs pa mngon gyi dus nas bsags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis mkhyen pa gang lags pa de dag thams
211b6(mdo sde): cad yongs su bsdu'o/ / yongs su bsdus nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o// bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag gis sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes/
211b7(mdo sde): par bgyid cing dgyes par bgyid par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su sbyong bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyid par gyur cig
212a1(mdo sde): dge ba'i gshes gnyen thams cad dang chos smra ba thams cad mgu bar bgyid cing dga' bar bgyid par gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstan pa
212a2(mdo sde): yang dag par 'dzin cing srung ba dang / yongs su skyong gyur cig/ sgrib pa'i ling tog thams cad rnam par sbyong bar gyur cig/ bdud kyi rtsod pa'i dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu
212a3(mdo sde): 'dul bar gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par gyur cig/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / dbang thams cad thob pa dang / mngon
212a4(mdo sde): par shes pa thams cad kyis rnam par brtse ba dang / rnam par thar pa thams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul bar gyur cig/ ci nas kyang 'khor ba ni mi 'bral zhing / tshe rabs gzhan
212a5(mdo sde): du rjes pa na chab 'tshal bar mi 'gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa pha rol tu phyin pa bskyud par mi 'gyur ba dang / byis pa so so'i skye bo dang 'dre bar 'grib pa'i cha dang
212a6(mdo sde): mthun par mi 'gyur ba de lta bur/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o// ci nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas mngon sum du
212a7(mdo sde): bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du sangs rgyas de dag la mchod pa bkod pa'i brgyan gyis brgyan par bgyid du mchis pa dang / sangs rgyas la mchod pa bkod pa'i rgyan de'i tha
212b1(mdo sde): ma'i sems bskyed pa thob pa yongs su rdzogs par dge ba'i rtsa bde dag yongs su bsngo'o/ / 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe na yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis phyag g.yas pa gser
212b2(mdo sde): gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/ bdag gi spyi bor 'jog par gyur cig/ ci nas bdag dngos po thams cad la mi blta ba bkod pa rgyun thogs ma mchis pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
212b3(mdo sde): yongs su bsgos pa'i sems dang / tshor ba thams cad rgyun chad pa'i sems kyis 'chis pa'i dus bgyid par gyur cig/ dad pa grangs ma mchis pa dang / rim mo gus par
212b4(mdo sde): bgyi ba grangs ma mchis pa dang / dga' ba dang dad pa grangs ma mchis pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la lta zhing rtog la/ kun tu smra bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus bgyid
212b5(mdo sde): par gyur cig/ mchod pa yid du 'ong bas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la mchod cing / me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang /
212b6(mdo sde): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dpag tu ma mchis pa dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la mchod cing lta la rtog bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par gyur cig
212b7(mdo sde): bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ sems can dmyal ba thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje 'jig rten thams
213a1(mdo sde): cad rgyun chad par gyur cig/ lha mo thams cad dang / mi dbul po thams cad dang / ser sna thams cad 'chal ba'i tshul khrims thams cad dang / gnod sbyin
213a2(mdo sde): sems can thams cad dang / le lo thams cad dang / rnam par g.yeng ba thams cad dang / 'chal ba'i shes rab thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig/ byang chub tu sems dpa'
213a3(mdo sde): dang sangs rgyas la lta ba dang / dam pa'i chos mnyan pa dang / dge ba'i gshes mnyen dang 'grogs pa dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag sangs rgyas bcom
213a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das thams cad dang lus mnyam par gyur cig/ ngag mnyam pa dang / sems mnyam pa dang / ye shes mnyam par gyur cig/ ji ltar gong du yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan
213a5(mdo sde): 'das bdag gi ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa chags pa mi mnga' zhing sgrib pa mi mnga' bas mkhyen cing rab tu mkhyen pa de lta bus/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dge ba'i
213a6(mdo sde): rtsa ba thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi ba de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
213a7(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i mchog gis yongs su bsngos so/ / gtso bo dang / dam pa dang / khyad par du 'phags pa dang / rab dang / phul dang / bla na ma mchis pa
213b1(mdo sde): dang / gong nas ma mchis pa dang / mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang / mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang / snang ba ma mchis pa dang / bdag nyid chen/
213b2(mdo sde): bopo dang / bla ma dang zil gyis mi non pa dang / yon tan gyi chos thams cad bsdud pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'i yongs su bsngo bas
213b3(mdo sde): yongs su bsngo'o/ / ji ltar bdag gis don du yongs su bsngos pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams ma lus pa thams cad na/ sems can ji tsam sems can gyi ris na
213b4(mdo sde): mchis pa sems can gyis khams de dag thams cad kyi ched du yang yongs su bsngo'o/ / dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di las su bdag shas kyis 'dzin par 'dod pa de dag gis kyang rjes su yi rang ngo // /
213b5(mdo sde): zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la dam 'cha' bar gnas pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad
213b6(mdo sde): ces smras so/ / 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chags pa kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/ rjes su yi rang ba kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / bskul ba kha na ma tho ba med pa
213b7(mdo sde): dang gsol ba 'debs pa kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems
214a1(mdo sde): dpa' chos thams cad la 'cha' bar gnas pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ / rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'das pa dang /
214a2(mdo sde): ma byon pa da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid la 'jug cing / des yan lag lnga sa la gtug par bya ste/ des pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
214a3(mdo sde): 'dzugs pa na/ tshig 'di skad ces sems can thams cad g.yas phyogs kyi lam la gnas par gyur cig/ ces brjod par bya'o// des pus mo g.yon pa'i lha nga sa la 'dzugs pa
214a4(mdo sde): na/ tshig 'di skad ces sems can gang su dag g.yon phyogs kyi lam la gnas pa de dag thams cad 'phags pa'i lam la gnas shing / yang dag pa'i lam la gnas par gyur cig
214a5(mdo sde): ces brjod par bya'o/ / des lag pa g.yas pas la 'dzugs pa na/ tshig 'di skad ces ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa la bzhugs pa/ dge ba'i
214a6(mdo sde): chos thams cad dang ldan pas/ dbu dang sku dang / skyil mo dkrung la yongs su dbyugs te/ phyag g.yas pa sa la bsnun nas/ bdud dpung dang bcas pa btul te/ byang chub
214a7(mdo sde): brnyes pa de bzhin du/ sems can 'di dag gis kyang bdud phyi rgol ba chom par gyur cig/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug cings chen po la bsnun nas/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thob
214b1(mdo sde): par gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o/ / des lag pa g.yon pa sa la 'dzugs pa na/ tshig 'di skad ces sems can gang su dag byis pa'i chos la gnas te/ g.yon phyogs su
214b2(mdo sde): 'dzin pa gdul dka' ba de dag thams cad bsdud pa'i dngos po bzhis shin tu sdud par gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o/ / des gdong dang da bral ba sa la gtug pa na/ tshig 'di skad
214b3(mdo sde): ces sems can thams cad nga rgyal ma mchis pa 'dis bla na med pa rnams la rim gro bgyid pa snyed cing / spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad 'phags
214b4(mdo sde): par gyur cig/ de ltar bdag yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal ba 'dis/ sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa lnga rnam par sel bar gyur cig/ dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par
214b5(mdo sde): gyur cig/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yongs su shes par gyur cig/ mngon par shes pa nyams pa med pa lnga thob par gyur cig/ mig lnga yongs su dag par gyur cig/ sems
214b6(mdo sde): can 'gro ba lngar skyes pa rnams 'gro ba lnga las khyad par du 'phags par gyur cig/ tshul khrims khyad par du 'phags pa dang / ting nge 'dzin khyad par du 'phags pa dang /
214b7(mdo sde): shes rab khyad par du 'phags pa dang / rnam par grol ba khyad par du 'phags pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba khyad par 'phags par gyur cig/ ces brjod par
215a1(mdo sde): bya'o/ / des yan lag lnga yongs su dag pa dang / sgribs pa lnga dang bral ba dang / stobs lnga la gnas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byed pa dang ma
215a2(mdo sde): bral bas/ tshig 'di skad ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sku dang ldan pa/ sku ma lags pa/ gsung dag pa gsung mi mnga' ba/ sems dang sems mi mnga' ba/ ye shes
215a3(mdo sde): chags pa mi mnga' ba dang ldan pa/ ma byon pa ma bzhud pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang ldan pa/ thams cad gzigs pa dang ldan pa rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag gis
215a4(mdo sde): 'khor ba thog ma'i mtha' mu nas gzung ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bdag gis mtha' ma 'tshal bas/ chos ma lags pa la chos su 'du shes bskyed pa dang / 'dul ba
215a5(mdo sde): ma lags pa la 'dul bar 'du shes bskyed pa dang / sbyin gnas ma lags pa la sbyin gnas su 'du shes bskyed pa dang / mi dge ba la dge bar 'du shes bskyed pa dang / phyin ci log gi
215a6(mdo sde): sems kyis bdag gi sems kyis bdag gi lus su lta bas yongs su dkris pa dang / dge ba'i chos gang sangs rgyas kyis bka' ma stsal ba mngon par 'dus bgyis pa dang
215a7(mdo sde): bgyid pa dang / bgyid du stsal pa dang / bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang bas 'gyur ba gang ci mchis pa de bdag 'a chags so// dmigs pa la gnas te/ bdag gis sems
215b1(mdo sde): / can ma mchis pa la sems can du 'du shes pa dang / sems can sgyu ma lta bur ma 'tshal nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gang lags//
215b2(mdo sde): pa de thams cad 'chags so// bdag gi mngon par 'dus bgyid pa ma mchis par ma 'tshal nas/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyis chos dge ba dang / mi dge ba mngon par
215b3(mdo sde): bgyid pa dang / mngon par bgyis pa gang lags pa de 'chags so// bdag gis sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang /
215b4(mdo sde): shes rab mnyam pa nyid du ma 'tshal nas/ dmigs par lhung bas sbyin pa byin pa dang / tshul khrims mchog tu 'dzin pas/ tshul khrims bsrungs pa dang / bdag dang gzhan
215b5(mdo sde): du 'du shes pas bzod pa bsgoms pa dang / lus dang sems la gnas te/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / 'du shes dang / dmigs pa la gnas te/ bsam
215b6(mdo sde): gtan skyed pa dang / kun tu rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa rab tu 'jug pa la mngon par dga' bas/ shes rab rnam par dpyad par gang lags pa de dag 'chags so//
215b7(mdo sde): bdag gis don dam pa'i mchod pa ma 'tshal nas/ gzugs dang rgyan da mtshan la mngon par zhen pas/ sangs rgyas la mchod pa bgyis pa gang lags pa de 'chags so//
216a1(mdo sde): bdag chos kyi dbyings tha mi dad pa'i ye shes la ma zhugs kyi/ chos tha dad pa la gnas te/ chos mnyam pa'am bshad pa 'am rab tu bsam par gyur pa gang
216a2(mdo sde): lags pa de chags so/ / bdag gis chos 'dus ma byas su ma 'tshal nas/ dge 'dun la mang por 'du shes te/ dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa gang lags pa de bdag
216a3(mdo sde): 'chags so/ / bdag gis dgon pa ma 'tshal nas dgon pa'i gnas bstan te/ 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes pa la mngon par zhen pa gang lags pa de dag bdag 'chags so//
216a4(mdo sde): bdag gis chos nyid gnas par 'tshal nas 'byung ba dang 'jig pa la gnas te/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan blang bar zhugs pa gang lags pa de dag bdag 'chags so// bdag gis
216a5(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings yongs su bzung ba ma mchis ma 'tshal ma zhugs kyis/ sems can bsdu bar 'tshal ba'i bsdu bas sems can dag bsdus pa gang lags pa de 'chags so//
216a6(mdo sde): bdag gis byang chub kyi mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin ma 'tshal nas/ lta ba yongs su zhen pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgom pa gang lags pa de 'chags so// bdag
216a7(mdo sde): gis dge sbyong gi lam zhi ba ma 'tshal nas/ rab tu byung ba bsnyen par rdzogs te/ dge sbyong gi dngos po bskyed pa gang lags pa de 'chags so// kun rdzob la 'jug pa'i dge ba'i
216b1(mdo sde): rtsa ba gzhan gang dag bsags pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis 'dus byas kyi bde bar gyur te/ 'dus ma byas las shin tu ring du gyur pa gang lags pa de dag 'chags so zhes
216b2(mdo sde): brjod par bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu de ltar thog mar byang chub sems dpa' bag la nyal dang bcas pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa dang / mtshan ma dang bcas pa dang / 'bang
216b3(mdo sde): pa dang bcas pa dang / spros pa dang bcas pa dang / len pa dang bcas pa dang / gnas pa dang bcas pa dang / rten pa dang bcas pa'i nye bar len pa'i chos thams cad bshags
216b4(mdo sde): par bya'o/ / de la 'di lta bu'i sdu ba dang / spros pa dang bcas pa kun tu mi 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni sdig pa bshags pa yongs su dag pa yin te/ 'di ni bshags pa'i phung po'o//
216b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin du 'dug ste/ tshigs 'di skad ces 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
216b6(mdo sde): 'das rnams kyi dang po thugs bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang ldan pa rnams kyi rab de'i dge ba'i
216b7(mdo sde): rtsa ba gang ci yang rung / sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa rtsa ba mchis shing rten ma mchis pas gtong ba rnam par dag pa dang / rang bzhin gyi tshul khrims mi zad mi skyed pa dang
217a1(mdo sde): sems can ma mchis pa'i bzod pa dang / dmigs pa las dben pa'i brtson 'grus dang / sems kyi ngo bo nyid la nges par sems pa'i bsam gtan dang / tshur
217a2(mdo sde): rol dang / pha rol gyi mthar lta ba rnam par spangs pa'i shes rab rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo la 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i byams pa dang / rnam pa'i rnam pa ma
217a3(mdo sde): mchis pa'i snying rje dang / chos la kun tu mi 'byung ba'i dga' ba dang / yal bar 'dor ba ma lags pa'i btang snyoms gang lags pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo //
217a4(mdo sde): khyim gyi dngos po thams cad bzung ba ma mchis shing yongs su ma bzung ba/ rtsa ba ma mchis shing rten ma mchis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma dran par gyur pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /
217a5(mdo sde): ma 'gags pa dang / ma skyes pa'i yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / lus dang / sems dang / brtson 'grus dang / 'dun pa dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /
217a6(mdo sde): dbang po lnga po mtshan nyid mchis pa'i dbang po rnams dang / nam mkha' ltar mi thul ba'i stobs rnams dang / don dam pa yang dag par rtogs pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang
217a7(mdo sde): mi gnyis pa'i lam dang ldan pa'i lam dang / zhi ba'i'i gnas thob pa dang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / mthun pa'i lhag pa'i mthong / mngon par shes pa ye shes sngon
217b1(mdo sde): du 'gro ba de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo / / thog ma'i mtha' nas lus kyi ngo bo nyid yongs su dag pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa'i ngag rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas la rim gro/
217b2(mdo sde): bgyi ba bsnyen bkur bgyid pa ma mchis pa dang / chos la rim gro bgyi ba chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa dang / dge 'dun la rim gro bgyi ba tshogs ma mchis shing yon tan
217b3(mdo sde): ma mchis pa dang / spyod lam thams cad rnam par ma brtags pa'i sdom pa spyod pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' gyur pa de dag
217b4(mdo sde): gis chos spyod pa yang dag pa'i sdom pa bdud thams cad kyis mi shigs pa 'jig rten thams cad dang ma 'dres pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sar ma nges pa/ byang chub
217b5(mdo sde): sems dpa'i lam dang mthun pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bzang po las dkar po ma lags pa 'gags par 'gyur ba gzhan gang ci mchis pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bzang po 'od gsal ba'i las
217b6(mdo sde): gang gis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thob pa dang / ma thob pa dang / 'thob par gyur pa de dag thams cad la bdag rjes su yi rang ngo // 'das pa
217b7(mdo sde): dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub bsnyen pa de dag gi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang
218a1(mdo sde): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba zag pa ma mchis pa dang / stobs mi thul pa rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa phyir mi ldog pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos chag
218a2(mdo sde): pa ma mchis pa rnams dang / kun tu mi 'byung ba'i byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa dang / spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa
218a3(mdo sde): gang lags pa dang / gnyis ma mchis pa'i bsod nams rnam par smin pa'i mtshan nyid dang / lus dang ngag dang / sems kyi rgyun bcos ma ma lags pa/ nam mkha' ltar yongs
218a4(mdo sde): su dag pa dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa thams cad kyis bskul ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo dang / brjod pa ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad la shes
218a5(mdo sde): ba snang ba rnam par shes pa las gzhan ma lags pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo / / sems can thams cad la phan gdag pa'i slad du/ thabs mkhas pa'i gnas la
218a6(mdo sde): dag 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa 'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang rung ste/ dam pa'i chos nub kyi bar du
218a7(mdo sde): de dag la mchod pa bgyis pa dang / bgyid pa dang / bgyis par 'gyur ba gang lags pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan
218b1(mdo sde): / las 'das pa de dag gi nyan thos 'dus pa/ sems can thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa rnams dang / ngad pas rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang / chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pa/
218b2(mdo sde): rnams dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang / log pa brgyad las yang dag par 'das pa'i brgyad pa rnams dang / chags pa med pa'i rigs la gnas pa'i rigs kyi sa pa
218b3(mdo sde): rnams dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rgyun las bzlog ste/ zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba gang du yang mi 'gro ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba 'di nas shis phos nas der
218b4(mdo sde): gnas par gyur pa rnams dang / dgra bcom pa grangs ma mchis shing skye ba ma mchis rab tu phye ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rang sangs rgyas rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo
218b5(mdo sde): khong du chud pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes mngon sum du rtogs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems pa'i sems sa dang mtshungs pa'i sems dang po bskyed pa nas
218b6(mdo sde): dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i chos las 'das shing
218b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos thob pa phyir mi ldog pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' skye ba thams cad las shin tu 'das pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis
219a1(mdo sde): thogs pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rten pa ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag dang / 'dus byas las yongs su rgal ba de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo //
219a2(mdo sde): 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi sems can rnams kyi sbyin pa'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims kyi bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dang
219a3(mdo sde): bsgom pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i dngos por gyur pa'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po sangs rgyas kyi sman gyis mkhyen pa dag lags pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo / /
219a4(mdo sde): rjes su yi rang ba mchog dang / ma chad pa dang / ma lhag pa dang / nam mkha' ltar rnam par dag pa dong / shes rab dang / ye shes kyi rtogs pa dang / gzhan yang nges pa'i
219a5(mdo sde): don gyi chos dang / ldan pa dang / bla na mchis pa dang / nam mkha' dang mnyam pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang / mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa nyid
219a6(mdo sde): kyi rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang ngo / / ji ltar 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gyur pa/ shes rab
219a7(mdo sde): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pas zung du 'brel par ma chags par spyod pa shin tu spyad pa spyod pa rab tu mkhyen nas/ mkhyen pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
219b1(mdo sde): mngon sum du mdzad nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la rjes su yi rang ba dang / rjes su yi rang bar mdzad pa dang / rjes su yi rang bar 'gyur pa'i mnyam pa nyid de dang chos nyid des rjes//
219b2(mdo sde): su slo ba de bzhin du/ bdag kyang rjes su yi rang ngo // rjes su yi rang ba mchog dang / ma chad pa dang / ma lhag pa dang / nam mkha' ltar rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab dang /
219b3(mdo sde): ye shes kyi rtogs pa dang / gzhan yang nges pa'i don gyi chos dang ldan pa dang / bla na ma mchis pa dang / nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang
219b4(mdo sde): ngo zhes brjod par bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa'i rjes su yi rang ba'i phung po kha na ma tho ba med pa'o// rigs kyi bu
219b5(mdo sde): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' des de bzhin du 'dug ste/ tshig 'di skad ces/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag kha cig 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis shing /
219b6(mdo sde): grangs ma mchis pa rnams su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ chos thams cad ma dmigs nas/ bdud bzhi 'i lam las
219b7(mdo sde): yang dag par 'das pa/ brjod du med pa'i chos skyon ma mchis pa rnyes pa/ yi ge dang / brjod pa dang / skad thams cad dang bral ba/ chos ji lta ba bzhin du brnyes pa
220a1(mdo sde): thabs mkhas pas chos bzung bar mdzad pa'i slad du/ ji tsam du brtags pa sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i slad du/ thugs rje chen pos chud
220a2(mdo sde): mi gzan pa/ bskul ba'i sa la bzhes pa cang ma gsung ba la dgyes pa/ byang chub kyi shing la gzigs pa lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang
220a3(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyis mngon par bstod do// dgyes shing bzhugs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la chos kyi 'khor lo rab
220a4(mdo sde): tu bskor bar bskul gyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo mi 'jug pa'i
220a5(mdo sde): chos kyi 'khor lo dang / mngon par mi 'grub pa'i 'khor lo dang / tshu rol dang / pha rol yongs su gcod pa'i 'khor lo dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo'i 'khor lo dang /
220a6(mdo sde): bdud phyir rgol ba choms pa'i 'khor lo bskor du gsol/ brjod du ma mchis pa'i rnga brdung du gsol/ sgra ma mchis pa'i dung bud du gsol/ chos shes pa'i rgyal mtshan dang
220a7(mdo sde): rtog bsgreng du gsol/ shes rab dang / ye shes dang / rnam par grol ba'i smon ma 'bar bar mdzad du gsol/ thugs rje chen po'i sprin bsdu bar gsol/ chos chen pom/
220b1(mdo sde): / chu'i char pa'i rgyun gyis sems can rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba'i lo rtogs rnam par spel du gsol/ 'phags pa'i shes rab dang / ye shes kyi nor gyis sems can thams cad
220b2(mdo sde): tshim par mdzad du gsol zhes brjod par bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bskul ba'i phung po kha nas ma tho ba med pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan
220b3(mdo sde): yang byang chub sems dpa' des de bzhin du 'dug ste/ tshig 'di skad ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams dpag tu ma mchis
220b4(mdo sde): pa dag na/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dag shin tu mdzad pa/ legs par bgyis pa'i chos kyi rgyun mi mchod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams shin tu lung bstan pa/ dge 'dun
220b5(mdo sde): 'phags pa rab tu gnas pa/ gdul ba'i sems can dag gshin btul ba/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba shin tu 'tshul ba/ chos bzung ba 'dzin par mdzad pa'i slad du
220b6(mdo sde): yongs su mi skyo ba/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par bzhed pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bdag chos kyi dbyings gnas pa'i tshul gyis/ ji ltar de dag mi skye ba
220b7(mdo sde): ma skyes pa de bzhin du/ ma 'gags mi 'gag 'gag par mi 'gyur par bzhugs su gsol lo zhes brjod par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gsol
221a1(mdo sde): pa debs pa yod pa ma yin pa/ len pa med pa/ kha na mtho ba med pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' des de bzhin du 'dug ste/ tshig 'di/
221a2(mdo sde): skad ces ma mchis bzhin du bdag gis mgos phyag bgyis pa dang / bshags pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / bskul ba dang / gsol ba 'debs pa gang lags pa dang
221a3(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal ba dang / 'chags pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / bskul ba dang / gsol ba 'debs pa de yang ma mchis pa/ len pa ma mchis pa/ 'dus ma gyis pa'o// de
221a4(mdo sde): ltar phyag 'tshal ba dang / 'chags pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / bskul ba dang / gsol ba 'debs pa gang lags pa de yang ma mchis pa/ len pa ma mchis pa
221a5(mdo sde): 'dus ma bgyis pa ste/ de bzhin du/ byang chub kyang len pa ma mchis pa/ 'dus ma gyis pa ste/ chos nyid de dang / ma chad pa dang / ma lhag pa dang / ma smad pa dang
221a6(mdo sde): mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang / mi thob pa dang / mi dma' ba'i yongs su bsngo bas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la chos phra rab tsam yang mi dmigs par yongs su
221a7(mdo sde): bsngo'o zhes brjod par bya'o/ / mig gzugs rnams la mi 'jug ste/ gzugs kyang mig la ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang dmigs pa'i rgyu rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa 'byung ste/
221b1(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa de yang mig las ma byung / gzugs las kyang ma yin te/ byung nas kyang zhig cing med de mi gnas so// de bzhin du rna ba la ma yin/ sgra la ma yin/ sna la ma
221b2(mdo sde): yin/ dri la ma yin/ lce la ma yin/ ro la ma yin/ lus la ma yin/ reg bya la ma yin te/ yid chos rnams la mi 'jug/ chos rnams kyang yid la mi 'jug mod kyi/
221b3(mdo sde): 'on kyang dmigs pa'i rgyu rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa 'byung ste/ de yang yid las kyang ma byung / chos las kyang ma yin te/ de ni byung nas zhig cing med de mi gnas so// de
221b4(mdo sde): bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub la mi 'jug/ byang chub kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba la mi 'jug mod kyi/ 'on kyang byang chub kyi rkyen gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba la dmigs pa'i sems skyed pa rnams
221b5(mdo sde): skye'o/ / de mi yang mi gnas pa ste/ skyes nas zhig cing med do// de la sems gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus byas pa dang / sems gang gis byang chub tu yongs su
221b6(mdo sde): bsngos pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag phan tshun du 'brel bar mi byed de/ 'di lta ste dper na/ me ni gang nas kyang ma 'ongs te/ byung nas kyang zhig cing med do// de bzhin du byang
221b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa kyi ma yang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs mod kyi/ 'ongs kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba la rten nas 'bar te/ byung nas zhig cing med do// ye shes
222a1(mdo sde): snang ba rab tu thob par chos rnam par byed pa de lta bu dag la blo rnam par mi spyod pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su sngo ba'o// skyon med par 'jug/
222a2(mdo sde): pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / bzod pa snang ba'i ye shes thob pa rnam par 'byed pa rnams kyi blo rnam par mi dpyod pa gang yin pa des/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'odas mngon sum
222a3(mdo sde): tu byas te/ yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes kyis/ byang chub
222a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su sngo bar bshad pa de bzhin du/ thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes kyi des yongs su sngo'o// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
222a5(mdo sde): bsngo ba kha na ma tho ba med pa'o/ / 'jam dpal bzhon nur gyur pas phung po gsum pa'i bsngo ba 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob
222a6(mdo sde): par gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la dma' 'char bar gnas pa yang mgu'o// lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang
222a7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bshad pa la mngon par bstod do/ / 'phags pa phung po gsum pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// // skad
222b1(mdo sde): gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas bstan la phab pa/ @rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pra ti thA na ma ti pa ri brid tsa nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/
222b2(mdo sde): bod skad du/ 'phags pa spobs pa'i blo gros kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal
222b3(mdo sde): lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong
222b4(mdo sde): gnyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' khri dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor mang pos yongs su
222b5(mdo sde): bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas/ chos bston to// de'i tshe tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba zhig tshong dpon gyi bu lnga brgya tsam so so'i g.yog 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgyas
222b6(mdo sde): yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar ba dang / lhan cig tu mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer nas byung ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba dang /
222b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lon gsum bskor ba byas nas/ g.yog
223a1(mdo sde): 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag
223a2(mdo sde): pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs ste/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
223a3(mdo sde): to/ / bcom ldan 'das ni bla ma'i mchog/ khams gsum pa'i dam pa/ byang chub kyi bsod nams kyi lhag pa'i gzhi/ sems can thams cad nges par sgrol bar mdzad pa/ kun tu
223a4(mdo sde): khyab pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i phyogs su thug pa ma mchis pa nges par thob par mdzad pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ma mchis pa'i dus snyigs ma'i snyogs pa lnga dang ldan pa la
223a5(mdo sde): drug gsum 'bar zhing / rab tu 'bar la/ gcig la gcig gdung bar bgyid pa'i sems can rnams kyi nang na/ gang nyes par bsam pa sems pa'i dus na/ gtso bo ma mchis
223a6(mdo sde): shing de gang gi yang ma lags pa dang rgyal po dang / blon po chen po rnams yul la sred pas zil gyis gnon te/ phan tshun mi mthun zhing gcig la gcig g.yul 'gyed pa dang / de dag
223a7(mdo sde): gcig la gcig g.yul 'gyed pa na/ gzhan gyi dmag gi dpung gi tshogs dang / de las bzhan pa yul gyi mi lus chab 'tshal ba rnams kyi ming yang mi gda' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
223b1(mdo sde): bsod nams kyis mthus/ sangs rgyas kyi slob ma gang zag bzhi po mang po de dag kyang bstan pa 'di la 'jug cing rab tu byung ba'i tshul thob pa dang / de dag kyang phyi rol gyis gos ngur smismrig tsam//
223b2(mdo sde): dang / khong ba'i nang gi 'dun pa dang / zhe sdang dang / shin tu ma gus shing phan tshun mi mthun pa la/ gcig la gcig skur pa 'debs par bgyid pa dang / skyon sgrog pa bgyid pa dang
223b3(mdo sde): yon tan nges par sbed par bgyid pa dang / nga rgyal dang rgyags pa dang / dregs pas non cing / ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin par bgyid pa dang / de dag shi bos na yang ngan song
223b4(mdo sde): gsum du skye zhing yud tsam zhig rnyed pa'i dpal yang ma 'tshal ba dang / tshe rabs gzhan dag tu bskal pa mang por sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi bzang ba/ rtsub pa/ tsha ba/ yid du mi mchi
223b5(mdo sde): ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang mthong lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/ sems can 'di dag yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / ngan 'gro'i lam nas rnam par bzlog nas
223b6(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi gzhal med khang thob par bgyi ba'i chos rnams gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros la 'di
223b7(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal to/ / spobs pa'i blo gros de ltar khyod seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu zhing / de ltar sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa
224a1(mdo sde): la chos zhu bar spro ba skyed pa legs so legs so/ / spobs pa'i blo gros sems can rnams gang thob nas/ legs par rab tu dpal dang ldan par 'gyur zhing //
224a2(mdo sde): nag po'i phyogs sgrub pa spangs nas/ dkar po'i phyogs la zhugs shing / don thams cad 'grub par gyur pa'i chos de dag khyod zhus shig/ zhus nas kyang the tsom med par nyon cig dang
224a3(mdo sde): bshad par bya'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ spobs pa'i blo gros kyi zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das las gang dag gis ni/ lha rnams kyi ris su skye bar 'gyur/
224a4(mdo sde): gang dag gis ni mi rnams kyi ris su skye bar 'gyur/ gang dag gis ni sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ gang dag gis ni dud 'gro rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ gang dag
224a5(mdo sde): gis ni yi dgas rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ gang dag gis ni rigs 'thon po rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ gang dag gis ni zan dang bran mo rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
224a6(mdo sde): 'das las gang dag gis ni mi rnams kyi nang du sems can skyes pa rnams skal ba zang por 'gyur zhing / khyim khol dang ldan pa dang / kha dri bda' ba dang / kha dog dang ldan pa dang /
224a7(mdo sde): mthong na dga' ba dang / gnod pa ma mchis pa dang / lus dang sems shin tu tha mal du gnas pa dang / skye bo mang pos bsngags pa rnams su 'gyur/ las gang dag gis ni sems
224b1(mdo sde): can rnams mi'i dam pa thob nas rtag tu skur pa 'debs pa thob par 'gyur zhing / skye bo mang po mi dga' ba dang / mdog mi sprugs pa dang / kha dri mi 'da' ba dang / gnod pa mang ba dang /
224b2(mdo sde): sems mi dga' ba dang / lus shin tu sbyangs pa ma lags pa dang / nyes byas kyi las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das las gang dag gis ni legs par gsung ba'i
224b3(mdo sde): chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu byung ba/ dge sbyong dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo nye bar zhi ba gtso bor 'dzin pa rnams/ gang dang gang du skye ba'i skye ba thams cad du/ rgyun tu sangs
224b4(mdo sde): rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong nas kyang / de dag las chos thos nas yid dga' zhing
224b5(mdo sde): ci bsam pa bzhin du don yang 'grub par 'gyur/ bdag gis zhu ba bcu po de dag zhus pa lags na/ 'byung po grangs ma mchis pa thams cad la sman pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das gsol
224b6(mdo sde): pa ma btab par dge ba'i bshes gnyen mdzad pa/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ dbang dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la lkog tu ma 'gyur ba'i spyan dang ldan pas/ rnam par phye ste
224b7(mdo sde): rgyas par lan stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ spobs pa'i blo gros khyod kyis ji ltar zhu ba zhus pa rnams rgyas par rnam
225a1(mdo sde): par phye ste bshad kyis nyon gcig/ tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar nyan pa dang //
225a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni/ lha nyid thob par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ dang po byams pa dang
225a3(mdo sde): ldan pa'i sems kyis gnod pa med par sems can rnams yongs su skyong bar byed cing / bzang po dang ldan pa rnams yin// gzhan gyi nor 'phrogs par mi byed cing / bkren pa'i sems dang
225a4(mdo sde): ldan pa ma yin pas yongs su gtong bar byed pa yi nas/ gzhan gyi chung ma la spyad pa rnams kyang yongs su dag pa yin te/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyang srung bar byed pa yin pa/ gso sbyong la brtson
225a5(mdo sde): zhing bden pa smra ba yin/ rang bzhin du 'dug cing rang gi skyon tshad med pa spong bar byed la/ myos par 'gyur ba'i gtung ba spangs pa yin te/ las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams lha'i lus thob
225a6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// srog chags gsod las ldog par byas pas lha dang mi dang lha mi rnams//
225a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten du ni mi thub lus can tshe ring nad med 'gyur ba yin// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dag pa'i lus can shes ldan dri med rdzogs pa'i lus// lha nang rab mchog de yi long spyod sna tshogs dpal
225b1(mdo sde): can rtag tu 'byung / / bor ma thag tu lha nang rtag tu lha'i dbang phyug rnams su 'gyur// bsam med bsal ba 'phrogs pa rnam log rin chen longs spyod rnams dang ldan// rtag tu dga' zhing
225b2(mdo sde): rab tu yid dga' dpal ldan gzhal med khang gnas shing / / rtse zhing dge ba'i dpag bsams shing yul nags ne me tog gtor lus ldan// ma khaso shing 'dod pa mi phan yongs spang+yas dri mchog
225b3(mdo sde): dam pa'i lus dang ldan/ / tshe rabs kun tu dpe med gser mchog lus dang ldan zhing rab tu mdzes// rtag tu lha yi nang du bskal pa bzang thob lus las 'od 'byung gyur// lha mo sna tshogs
225b4(mdo sde): tshogs kyis bskor cing 'dod pa'i dpal la spyod par byed/ / sngon chad cho ga bzhin du ngag skyon bzhi spangs kha na dri zhim ldan// gsal zhing 'thogs med mi 'jigs tshig mchog lha rnams
225b5(mdo sde): 'dir ni nges par 'byung / / yang dag lan 'debs rnam bsgrags snyan cing skye bos shin tu tshig bzung 'os// pi wa nga rol mo'i sgra 'byor sprin sgra skad snyan po brang 'khor skad ldan/
225b6(mdo sde): ma rmongs sems kyis myos 'gyur ma legs brjod byed spangs pas lhar 'gyur zhing // grags med dge ba'i lha yis mchod pa lha yi gnas na gnas par 'gyur// blo dang ldan zhing lus
225b7(mdo sde): brtan yid bzang bag yod kun dang ldan par 'gyur/ / de dag rtag tu bde 'gyur dbang rnams de dag phan pa brjod par byed// gal te tshe zad lha yul nas lhung ba yi lha rnams de tshe smad//
226a1(mdo sde): sdig med lo brgya nyi shu 'gron lha yi gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur// bsod nams lnga mngon gyur pas de ni dam pa dpal ldan lus 'od can// lha rnams lam sel byed
226a2(mdo sde): cing lha rnams bye bas mchod de bstan par 'gro/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa// spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga dang
226a3(mdo sde): ldan pa rnams/ mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ dang po byas pa bzo bas byin pa dang bkren pa dang / dbul po dang / sdug bsngal bas las kun 'gyed pa dang 7
226a4(mdo sde): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la ma nyams par bsten pa dang la/ sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyis sems can le lo can rnams dge ba'i chos
226a5(mdo sde): la spro bar byed cing / nges pa'i sems kyis gus pa dang bcas pa/ mthun par 'dzin pa ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams mi nyid thob par 'gyur
226a6(mdo sde): zhing / longs spyod kyang chen por 'gyur ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / mdzes pa dang / gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi rje dpon du 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das
226a7(mdo sde): kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ / sbyin pa byin pas mi yi rgyal po dam par 'gyur// rtag tu longs spyod 'byor dang ldan pa rab tu 'gyur// lus ngan po dang mtshungs par
226b1(mdo sde): sbyin dang spyon par byed/ / rigs dang dam pa thob pas rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur// tshul khrims ma nyams de ni dkon mchog mchod par byed// nyes byas yongs su spangs pas shin tu nges/
226b2(mdo sde): bo ste// tshe ring dam pa thob pas 'chi 'pho med pa yin// bde ba thob pas skyon med rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// nges pa'i mi ni pha rol sems 'khrugs ma byas shing // gzhan dag rnams
226b3(mdo sde): kyis gnod byas phyir na gnod mi byed/ / de bzhin tshig ngan brjod kyang gshe bar mi byed pas// dge ba'i mchog gi tshul thob nas ni mdzes par 'gyur// brtson 'grus bzang la lhag
226b4(mdo sde): pa'i bsam pas sems dkar zhing / / stobs dang gzi brjid chen po dge ba rnams dang ldan// dmag dpon nyid kyi dam pa thob par 'gyur bas na// longs spyod 'byor pa'i spyod
226b5(mdo sde): yul ldan pas lhang nger 'gyur/ / mi 'phrogs sems ldan mkhas shing shin tu mthun pa ste// byas pa gzo zhing las la 'dod pa rab tu byed// dkon mchog gsum dang ma la sogs la
226b6(mdo sde): mchod mdzad pa/ / nam yang kun la the tsom byed par mi 'gyur ro// mi gang khyad par 'phags pa dge ba lnga po rnams// byed pa de ni sa yi bdag por rab tu 'gyur// stobs la sogs dang gzugs
226b7(mdo sde): dang longs spyod mi zad ldan/ / grags ldan shin tu gtso bo rnams kyi rim gro byas de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa// spobs pa'i blo
227a1(mdo sde): khros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni/ sems can dmyal 'arnams su skye par 'gyur zhing/ skyes nas kyang dedag tu bskal pa skyebam por gnas par gyur te/
227a2(mdo sde): lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog la dang par mi byed la/ kun tu bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod pas skur pa 'debs par byed cing
227a3(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i lam la brnyas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'jig pa dang / bar gyi dus na yang dge slong dang dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma gang zag zhi po
227a4(mdo sde): mang por mi gus pa/ mthun par mi 'dzin par 'jig rten gyi smra ba lhur len pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor 'phrogs pa/ gcig la gcig nyes rtsom gyis/ gcig la gcig
227a5(mdo sde): skur pa 'debs pa'i tshig gis/ rgyal po dang / rje dpon dang / blon po dang / pa dang bu rnams gcig la gcig mi mthun pas mi gus pa rnams dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dge
227a6(mdo sde): slong rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ston pa la bsten nas/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung
227a7(mdo sde): ste/ bdag nyid dge slong yin par khas 'che zhing / dge ba'i chos yang dag par sgrub pa la mi gnas la/ mkhan po dang / slob dpon rnams mgu bar mi byed cing / dka' blo mi bde
227b1(mdo sde): la/ mthun par mi 'dzin cing yang dag par rjes su bstan kyang rjes su bstan pa la/ sgrub par mi byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub spong bar byed la/ bdag la bstod par byed/
227b2(mdo sde): gzhan la smod par byed cing / nga rgyal dang / rgyag pa dang / dregs pa'i shas che la/ bla ma rnams la brnyas par byed/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la lhag par zhen cing / skur pa
227b3(mdo sde): yang 'debs par byed pa ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni/ sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur zhing / skyes nas kyang ji srid du sto//
227b4(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'jig pa ma byung ba de srid du gnas par gyur zhing / 'jig pa byung nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na sems can dmyal ba gang dag yod
227b5(mdo sde): bapa de dag tu 'phen par 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe der yang 'jig pa byung bar gyur na/ de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na sems can dmyal ba gang dag yod pa de dag tu 'phen par 'gyur ro//
227b6(mdo sde): de bzhin du sbyar te/ kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams grungs med pa dag na/ sems can dmyal ba gang dag yod pa de dag tu 'khyam zhing / sdug bsngal nyams su myong la byung ba'i mtha' med do//
227b7(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// rmongs pas thog ma med nas 'jig pa'i sdug bsngal bying gyur pa'i// 'jig rten sangs
228a1(mdo sde): rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho bas len mi byed de/ de ni kun rig ma yin rnal 'byor rgyal po ma yin zhes// bdag nyid chung bzod skye bo gzhan rnams la yang slu bar byed// bde bar/
228a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'byor pa sdug pa'i mchog byas na// dge ba chung ngur 'gyur zhing 'jig par byed pa'i char 'gyur zhing // mi dge 'di ni mngon sum dge ba mdun na yod bzhin du/
228a3(mdo sde): sdig pa rnam pa sna rtogs pan par byo// par mthod pa'i sum da bzhi po 'i ches pas nyam // lan tshun la yon nu yin pas bzugs shes thas ston par byes
228a4(mdo sde): 'khor du 'dus pa 'dul ba'i dga' ba 'di ni rnam bshigs pas/ / mi bzad ro med log par ltung ba'i sar ni 'gro bar 'gyur// rgyal po pha dang sring mo spun dang gzhon nu bu mo rnams//
228a5(mdo sde): byams pa'i yid ni log 'gyur longs spyod rnams la brkam chags te// byis pa bu rnams thams cad gcig la gcig ni bzhad gang byed// log lhung dam pa rnam par 'byings par myur du 'gro
228a6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/ / ma 'ongs dus 'dir gang dag shin tu sdig can sems can rnams// mthun par mi 'dzin dge sbyong kha dog 'dzin pa gzugs mi sdug/ ngan pa'i bdag nyid ldan pa sdig pa
228a7(mdo sde): khrag khrig byed 'gyur ba/ / de dag shi phos nas ni sdig brtsod pa'i mchog gis gnon// mi yis bskal po brgya phrag mang por sdig pa lnga po dag/ bsgrubs shing byas pa dag ni
228b1(mdo sde): bshags par nus pa ma yin te/ / gang du sangs rgyas khrag khrig gis kyang bskyabs par mi spyod pa'i// mi ri drag po mnur med pa yi mer ni sreg par 'gyur/ de nas
228b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni dud gro'i rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/
228b3(mdo sde): dang po 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang / chom rkun dang / gzhan gyi bu lon blangs nas/ gnod sems su byed pa dang / srog gcod pa dang / ma dad pas dam pa'i chos ma yin pa
228b4(mdo sde): nyan par dga' zhing / dam pa'i chos ma yin pa nyan pa la dga' bas/ log pas 'tsho ba thams cad la dga' ba ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa
228b5(mdo sde): rnams ni/ dud 'gro rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to// rtag tu gzhan gyi nor 'phrogs pa
228b6(mdo sde): la dga' ba'i mi rnams ni/ bu lon byin pa rnam par blangs nas mi gzhan gsod par byed// srog gcod pa la dga' ba'i ri dgas 'chi bdag rgyal po rnams// rgya la sogs pas bzung
228b7(mdo sde): nas sems can rnams la gsod par byed/ / dad pa la sogs dman pa'i blo gros dkar po'i 'du shes can// nag po'i dpag tu med pa bdag cag spyod pa mi shes pa// rmongs pa
229a1(mdo sde): rnams ni dam chos dkon mchog gtam la dga' mi byed/ / 'jig rten zhugs pa'i chos la 'dir ni rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur// ji ltar gang ri las 'dir khab bya ba dang /
229a2(mdo sde): rab bab pas// chu yi chu yi shugs kyis 'phrul dus 'og 'gro ba bzhin// lha'i mi'i grong du sdig pa'i phung po mang du byas pas na// rmongs pa rnams ni de bzhin dud 'gro rnams su
229a3(mdo sde): myur du 'gro/ / rta dreru rnga bong glang chen ba lang ma he seng ge dang // wa dang sbrul dang phag dang khyil sogs par gyur nas su// rtswa za ba dang sha dang bdud rtsi lo ma'i zas za zhing //
229a4(mdo sde): de dag rtag tu gzhan gyi khur khyer byed cing dub par 'gyur// bkres pas zil gyis gnon pas gcig la gcig za lhur byed pa// bskal pa khrag khrig rnams su'ang nam yang thar bar mi
229a5(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing / / ci ltar rgya mtsho gcig na ru sbal mig ni gcig yod pas// gnya' shing bu gar mgrin pa gtad par mi nus pa// de bzhin lha dang mi dang dbang phyug che nyid bde blag tu//
229a6(mdo sde): log par ltung ba brgya yis thob par nus pa ma yin te// sangs rgyas 'od gzer dam pa'i tshogs can dpag tu med pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' khyu mchog 'od kyis de dag 'byin par
229a7(mdo sde): 'gyur/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni/ yi dgas kyi
229b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / lnga gang zhe na/ dang po bkren zhing chags pa dang / mun pa mun nag chen po'i ka shes gnyen dang / gsogs pa lhur byed pa'i phyir/ bdag
229b2(mdo sde): nyid kyang longs spyod par mi byed pa dang / chos ma yin pa dang ldan pa'i phyir phyag dog dang / ser sA lhur byed pas spunA dang srin mo dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / zan dang
229b3(mdo sde): las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / mdza' bshes dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / 'brel pa dang / sbyin gnas dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa
229b4(mdo sde): thams cad la rab tu sbyin par mi byed cing / pha ma dag la yang rab tu sbyin par mi byed pa dang / nges par bskyang bar 'os pa dag mi skyong la bsnyen bkur mi byed cing / bla ma la mi gus la
229b5(mdo sde): gces par mi byed pa ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni yi dgas rnams su skyes par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
229b6(mdo sde): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ / bkren pa'i nyes pas bcom pa nor gtong mi phod pa// de dag gzhan dag las ni blang bar 'dod par byed// mdzod rnams kyi
229b7(mdo sde): ni sgo 'phar dam du bsdams pa rnams/ / 'dir ni bskyang 'os tsa lags mchog rnams gso mi byed// gzhan nor chud gson pa yis rtag tu skrag pa rnams// bla ma la yang de dag
230a1(mdo sde): rab rtsub byams can min/ / de dag bdag gi chung ma la sogs g.yogs tshogs la// dbyig sbyin mi byed shin tu snying rtse shes med cing // dkar po dag las log/
230a2(mdo sde): pa de dag 'di nas shis 'bas nas// yun ring mchog tu lus 'bar sdug bsngal yi dgas 'gyur// de nas lo brgya rnams su rmi lam rmis par yang / dgos dang zas dang btung ba nam
230a3(mdo sde): yang rmi mi 'gyur/ / khab 'dra'i kha dang ri chen lta bu'i lho can rnams// nyam thag shar dang nub kyi rgya mtshor rgyug par byed// kha nas me 'bar lus ngan phyogs dang lho phyogs gzhan//
230a4(mdo sde): bskam par mthong nas rin chen me rnams lhung bar 'gyur// gshin rje'i pho nya dpung mgo las grub rab tu gtsang // sra ldan rnams kyis mnan nas zangs bzhun bzod dka' bar// me
230a5(mdo sde): 'dra ro bro med pa de dag rnams la ldud/ / rmongs rnams yan lag brgyad ldan chu bzhin 'thung bar byed// nang khrol lus kyi khong pa bsregs pa bsil ba'i rlung gis su// skyes pa'i bdag
230a6(mdo sde): nyid rnams la stobs chen yang sdug byed/ / de nas shi phos mi yi 'jig rten 'dir skyes rnams// rigs dang longs spyod lus g.yog rnams kyi dman par 'gyur// de nas
230a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni rigs mthon po rnams su 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na
230b1(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ zang zing dang chos kyi sbyin bdag gis 'jig rten thams cad la gnod sems med par 'gyur ba dang / dkon mchog gsum dang / pha ma la gus pa dang / snyun n+ya/
230b2(mdo sde): skyes pa'i bzod pa dang / nges pa dang / shin tu gya nom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung rnam pa sna tshogs klog pa dang / kha ton du bya ba la brtson pa ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros
230b3(mdo sde): sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni/ rigs mthon po rnams su 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su cad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// /
230b4(mdo sde): bas ma byas gang dag bsod nams tshogs pa bskal bzang sbyin pa'i cho ga bzhin// kun tu sems can mang la kun bged de dag rtag tu nad med 'gyur// tshe dang kha dog stobs ldan lus
230b5(mdo sde): can 'jig rten mchog tu 'gyur/ / mtshungs dang rgyal tshon khyad par can gyis mdzes brjod rin chen ri dbang bzhin// 'dul ba nyam dga' dkon mchog mtshungs med pa ma rnams la bsnyen
230b6(mdo sde): bskur bas/ / shin tu rgya chen gtso mchog khyim du skyes pa grangs med skye bos mchod// shin tu nus kyang yid 'khrug rnams spangs kun tu gzugs kyis 'phags pa rnams// 'jig
230b7(mdo sde): rten rnams kyi mig tu sdug pa skal bzang rigs ni 'thon por 'gyur/ / gang dag brtan zhing kun bzod shin tu yid bzang dkar dang mthun rnams dang // mi rnams gang dag shes
231a1(mdo sde): rab dag mchog sangs rgyas gsung la kha don brtson/ / de dag 'byor pa thob nas rigs mchog skyes pa kun tu kun mchog mdzes// de dag dge bas rgyas pas
231a2(mdo sde): lus chen rgya mtsho chen po bzhin du smra/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi yang spongs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa
231a3(mdo sde): rnams ni/ bran dang bran mo nyid thob par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha ma rnams la mi gus pa dang / gya nom pa'i sems ma yin pa dang / zlog pa med cing ci gar
231a4(mdo sde): sdig pa spyod pa dang / gzhan gyi nor 'phrogs pa dang / bu lon 'phrogs nas bdag sbed pa ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga po de dag ldan pa rnams ni bran dang bran mo nyid thob/
231a5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// bsod nams rgya chen 'byor pa gangs 'od lta bu'i khyim du skye thob nas/
231a6(mdo sde): blun po gang dag rgyags khengs dregs pas dkrugs shing gus par mi byed la// pha ma rnams la rmad byung byin gnas 'dra bar 'du shes mi byed pa// de dag nyes pas gzhan du 'jig rten
231a7(mdo sde): dbang 'gyur dman zhing g.yon can 'gyur/ / dkon mchog mtshungs med rnams la mgus lhur byed ma rung brlangs tshig 'gyur// gang dag byams dang de bzhin snying rje'i ma lus dge bcu
231b1(mdo sde): chung gzon pa/ / de dag grangs med skye bar 'dzin med gzhan 'joms ngo tsha mi shes shing // mi yi yul du zan nyid spangs nas skad cig gis ni dma' bar 'gyur// gzugs dang dbang /
231b2(mdo sde): phyugs rigs mchog blo bral dman la mos pa'i glen par 'gyur// dkon mchog rnams mi mchod pas nga rgyal med cing zhun la mdangs ngan 'gyur// dpal kun med cing ting nge
231b3(mdo sde): 'dzin bral ba las rnams kyis ni bsdigs par 'gyur/ / de dag 'jig rten kun dka' dga' ston che sogs med cing tshogs kyis 'tsho/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
231b4(mdo sde): kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni skal ba bzang por 'gyur zhing / khyim khol dang kha dri zhim pa dang
231b5(mdo sde): gnod pa med pa dang / lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa dang / blta na sdug pa dang / skye bo mang pos bsngags pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'du shes
231b6(mdo sde): ci lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa dang / ma tshangs pa med pa dang / sgro btags pa med pa'i tshigs dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / theg pa chen po dang / theg pa rnam pa gsum
231b7(mdo sde): po thams cad kyi tshig gi rang bzhin la mi bzod pa med cing / mi smod la mi spong zhing / de dag thams cad du bzung ba dang / bshad pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton la sogs pa byed pa dang /
232a1(mdo sde): ngag gi skyon bzhi po tshad med pa rnam par spyod zhing / 'phags pa'i lam la skur ba mi 'debs pa dang / sems can log par sgrub pa la gnas pa rnams la snying brtsa
232a2(mdo sde): ning / yongs su bskyangs pa dang / skyon de las bzlog cing dge ba la dgod pa dang / gzhan gyi skyon mthong ba'i brjod pa yal bar 'jog pa skye/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can
232a3(mdo sde): las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni/ mi rnams kyi nang du skyes nas/ bskal pa bzang por 'gyur zhing khyim khol dang ldan pa dang / kha dri zhim pa dang / yid gzhungs pa dang /
232a4(mdo sde): mthun pa dang / skye bo mang po dga' ba dang / mya ngan med pa dang / sems mal du gnas pa dang / khro ba med pa dang / gnod pa med pa dang / kha dog dang / ldan pa
232a5(mdo sde): dang / grags pa dang ldan pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas sogs la shin
232a6(mdo sde): tushas cher gus 'bad pa ma rnams mchod pas/ / rtag tu ngag skyon kun 'bral 'jig rten dag tu rmad du 'byung bar 'gyur// tshig gi yon tan bzung 'os rnga sgrar bcas shing tshe rab kun
232a7(mdo sde): tu phan/ / ut+pal dri dang mdzes pa'i rlung ldan kha yis phyogs su snyan par grags// gang dag bdag byams gzhan mtshungs mi phan skyon brjod sdig pa ngan pa las// phral nas dge ba
232b1(mdo sde): kun la sems can rnams ni spyod du 'jug byed pa/ / de dag mi yi 'jig rten thob nas skal bzang kun tu thams cad dga'// shin tu yid 'ong rin chen yul can bde gnas sdig
232b2(mdo sde): las ldog par 'gyur/ / dam pa'i chos ni bzung dang bstan brtson de sems byed cing nges par 'gyur// 'dir ni sems can kun la pha ma 'dra bar byams pa'i sems ldan 'gyur//
232b3(mdo sde): 'das pa'i dus su lus can kun ni nged kyis rtsa lag tshogs gyur ces// de ltar zla ba lta bu'i sems sbyangs de dag la ni phan par byed// 'gran dregs khyad gsod la sogs rnam pa
232b4(mdo sde): sna tshogs phan tshun sun 'byin pa'i/ / sdig pa yongs su spangs nas dag pa'i yid can skyon rnams kun spangs nas// sems can lhag pa'i bsam pa dge bas snyan tshogs phan tshun
232b5(mdo sde): brjod par byed/ / myur du lha yi dbang phyug mtshungs med thob nas sungs rgyas dge bar 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal
232b6(mdo sde): ba/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni dam pa thob nas/ rtag tu bskur ba 'debs pa thob par 'gyur zhing / skye bo mang po mi dga' ba dang / mdog mi sdug pa dang /
232b7(mdo sde): kha dri mi zhim pa dang / sems mi dga' ba dang / gnod pa mang ba dang / lus shin tu sbyangs pa ma yin par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lto ste/ brdzun du smra ba dang / brdzun du smra bas rtag tu
233a1(mdo sde): gzhan bslu ba'i sems lhur len bya dang / chos kyi 'bel bu'i gtam chen po la 'dus pan/ chos kyi gtum de la rnam par spyod pa dang / 'tshangs pa mtshungs par
233a2(mdo sde): spyod pa rnams mthong na de dag la brnyas shing khyad du gsod pa dang / dma' ba'i sems su byed pa ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las ldi de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni/ mi'i
233a3(mdo sde): dam pa thob nas rtag tu skur pa 'debs pa thob par 'gyur zhing / skye bo mang po mi dga' ba dang / mdog mi sdug pa dang / kha dri mi zhim pa dang / sems mi dga' ba dang / gnod pa
233a4(mdo sde): mang pa dang / lus shin tu sbyangs pa ma yin par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// sems yid rnams kyis
233a5(mdo sde): gzhan sems drag tu 'khrug dang sdig pa rnams byas pas/ / log pa'i ngag dang gzhan la gnod par dga' ba tha ma rnam sems dang // lus kyis sdug bsngal gzhal med rdzogs pa bar med nyams
233a6(mdo sde): su myong bar 'gyur/ / lcags kyi lcags kyus chen po rnon po rnams kyis nyam thag lce 'byin 'gyur// gshin rje'i dbang phyug gnas su'ang mi rnams shin tu zangs skol ldung par 'gyur// dmyal
233a7(mdo sde): bar mi bden tshig can skyes pa de dag dga' bar yongs mi 'gyur/ / gang tshe 'dir ni tshig bzang bral ba ro ltar kha dri mi zhim zhing // 'jig rten mig tu yid 'ong blta sdug ma yin rnams su
233b1(mdo sde): 'gyur/ / rgyal po'i 'o brang 'khor du mi snyan skur ba de bas rtsod pa'i skyon mang zhing // de dag rtag tu skyon gnas mi ni sa yang mang pos gleng bar 'gyur// sems can brdzun smra rnams kyis
233b2(mdo sde): tham sems dang lus bde ma yin phyir/ / sngar bshad nyes 'gro yi 'bras bu sdug bsngal mang po spyod par 'gyur// mi nyid spangs nas dbang med mi rnams bde bkun la sku byed pa'i//
233b3(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten 'gro 'gyur de nas shi 'phos gyur nas ni// 'gro ba lnga po'i 'khor po'i 'khor lo rtsub par dud 'gro rnams su skye// de ltar lus can 'khyam pa rnams
233b4(mdo sde): kyi sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur ba med/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ spobs pa'i blo gros dge sbyong dang / rigs kyi bu dang /
233b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo nye bar zhi ba gtso bor 'dzin pa'i sems can chos lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni/ gang dang gang du skye ba'i skye ba de dang de thams cad du rtag par sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun dang
233b6(mdo sde): phrad pa thob par 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong nas kyang / de dag las chos kyang thos nas/ yid dga' zhing ci bsams pa bzhin du/ byang chub rnams
233b7(mdo sde): thob par 'gyur la/ ci 'dod pa bzhin du phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyang thob par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag nyid dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song nas/
234a1(mdo sde): gzhan dag kyang dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba sgrub pa la rnam par 'jog par byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad kun tu rdzogs shing rgyas la rgya chen po legs
234a2(mdo sde): par byas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed du 'jugs pa dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon shes shing gus pa dang bcas pa dang bka' blo bde ba dang mthun par 'dzin
234a3(mdo sde): bapar bsgrub pa dang / kun tu thog pa med pa'i 'od gzer rnams kyis sems can thams cad bdag dang 'dra zhing bu gcig pa'i byams pa dang 'dra bar mthong ba dang / ci ltar btsems
234a4(mdo sde): pa'i mdo grub pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton dang / lung mnod pa dang / bshad pa rnams yid la byed pa yangs shing rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag gis bar chad med par bsgom pa la
234a5(mdo sde): mngon par zhen cing sgrubs par byed pa ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros dge sbyong dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo nye bar zhi ba gtso bor 'dzin pa'i sems can chos lnga po de dag dang
234a6(mdo sde): ldan pa rnams ni/ gang dang gang du skye ba'i skye ba de dang de thams cad du/ bar chad med par sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur
234a7(mdo sde): zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong nas kyang de dag las chos kyang thos nas/ yid dga' zhing ci bsams pa bzhin du/ byang chub rnams thob par 'gyur la/ ci 'dod pa
234b1(mdo sde): bzhin du phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyang thob par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gang dag sangs rgyas
234b2(mdo sde): yon tan mchog gis chos la gnas/ / de dag nyid kyi sems can thams cad 'dul bar byed// sangs rgyas sku gzugs gzugs legs rnams ni byed par 'gyur// mkhas pa
234b3(mdo sde): rnams ni slob dpon tshig la mchod par byed/ / gang dag phyogs bcu rnams kyis 'jig rten ma lus la// bdag dang bu gcig byams pa rnams dang 'drar mthong ba// de dag srid pa kun tu
234b4(mdo sde): mya ngan med nges 'gyur/ / shin tu rnam dag thugs mnga' sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong // gang dag shes rab rin chen chen po 'byor mdzad rnams// nyin dang mtshan du dge ba kun//
234b5(mdo sde): spyod par byed// 'dir ni rmad du 'byung ba'i 'od dang ldan pa rnams// 'jig rten mun pa che la snang ba mchog byed 'gyur// kun tu chos rnams thams cad rab tu rnam phye nas// sangs
234b6(mdo sde): rgyachos lam las mchog ni gzhan med par/ / nges par byas nas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi// mthar thug 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu ni shes rab 'gyur// de nas tshong
234b7(mdo sde): dpon spongs pa'i blo gros chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu ste/ yi rangs nas/ rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo//
235a1(mdo sde): tshang dpon gyi bu lnga brgya tsam po dang / ma ma chi g.yog 'khor lnga brgya tsam de dag ni chos rnams la chos kyi sdig rdul med rnying drim dang bral ba zlab 'o// bcom ldan
235a2(mdo sde): 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang
235a3(mdo sde): mi dang mi ma yin pa ji snyed 'dus par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyis ni/ ci bsams pa bzhin gyis theg pa rnams la sems bskyed do// ci 'dod pa bzhin du phun sum tshogs pa yang
235a4(mdo sde): thob cing me tog dang spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / gos dang / rgyan la sogs pa dpag tu med pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor to// de nas tshong dpon spobs pa'i
235a5(mdo sde): blogrogros stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas
235a6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das khams gsum pa'i bla ma chos lnga po 'di dag legs par gsung ba legs so legs so// chos lnga po de dag zos nas/ 'khor
235a7(mdo sde): 'di yid bzhin du thams cad rdzogs par don grub par 'gyur lags so/ / ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyang 'di nyid thos nas nag po'i phyogs spangs te/ dkar po'i
235b1(mdo sde): phyogs la zhugs shing brtul zhugs 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu/ sang bdag gi sdum par spyan 'dren na/
235b2(mdo sde): bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ khyod kyis de ltar gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros la thug brtse ba'i slad du ga nang bar
235b3(mdo sde): mdzad do/ / de nas tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar rig nas/ tshim zhing mgu ste/ yi rangs nas rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba
235b4(mdo sde): dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas
235b5(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo // de rang gi khyim du song nas pha ma gnyis kyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas te/ thal mo lkug lkug por sbyar nas/ 'di skad ces
235b6(mdo sde): smras so/ / yab yum 'di ltar gang 'jig rten na shin tu dkon pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal po khams gsum pa thams cad las 'das pa/ bcom
235b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gis gdugs tshod la spyaspyan drangs na/ des kyang bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du gnang lags kyis mkhyen
236a1(mdo sde): par mdzod cig/ de nas spobs pa'i blo gros kyi pha ma dag yang yid dga' ste/ 'di skad ces smras so// bu legs so// khyod kyis legs
236a2(mdo sde): par byas so zhes mngon par bstod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i las la spro bar gyur to// de nas spobs pa'i blo gros kyi rang gi chung ma dam pa g.yog 'khor dang
236a3(mdo sde): bcas pa la bsgo ba/ bzang mo khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor dang bcas pa'i don du/ bza' ba dang /
236a4(mdo sde): btung ba dang ro brgya dang ldan pa mang po dang / bsod par sbyor cig/ sbyar nas kyang khyim thams cad chag chag gdab pa dang / phyag dar bya ba dang / bla re bre ba dang
236a5(mdo sde): dar gyi lnga ldi gdags pa dang / me tog chal par dgram po dang / gdug spos dri zhim pos gdug par byed du bcug la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang
236a6(mdo sde): thabs gcig pa'i gang na ci 'os thing ste/ mchod yon dang zhabs la dbul ba spyan sngar bzhag pas bcom ldan 'das dam pa de la sdod cig ces bsgo ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros
236a7(mdo sde): mdza' bshes dang / blon po dang nye du dang / rgan rabs la sogs pa dang / lhan cig 'grogs shing ci skad smras pa thams cad byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
236b1(mdo sde): de'i mtshan mo 'das nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi 'tshal skyed mos tshal chen po nas/ sems can rnams la thug brtse bas/ de bzhin
236b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi dpal rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par bstan pa'i rol dpal cho 'phrul dang bcas par mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer chen por gshegs so/ / gshegs
236b3(mdo sde): nas kyang rim gyi spabs pa'i blo gros kyi khyim ga la ba der logs su bzhud do/ / de nas spobs pa'i blo gros g.yog 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das bsu nas
236b4(mdo sde): mchod yon dang zhabs la dbul bas/ bcom ldana'adas kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhab ring ba dang bcas par khyim gyi nang du gshegs te
236b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ni ci 'os pa'i gdan mchog la bzhugs so/ / dge slong gi dge 'dun ni ci 'os pa la 'khod do// de nas spobs pa'i blo gros kyi pha ma dang / slas dang /
236b6(mdo sde): mdzes bshes dang / slob dpon dang / nye du dang / rgan rabs rnams ni yid dga' zhing 'dud la/ bla ma la gus pa dang / gces par byed pa chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong
236b7(mdo sde): gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig pa la 'drim par rtsom mo/ / spobs pa'i blo gros ni/ me tog dang / spos chur bcas pas bkang ba'i ril ba thogs nas/ ston pa'i sman sngar 'dug par gyur to//
237a1(mdo sde): yang de'i tshe sdug bsngal ba'i grogs po gnyis shig/ spobs pa'i blo gros kyi khyim du phyin par gyur nas/ de nyid las gcig ni dge 'dun gyis nang du zhugs so//
237a2(mdo sde): de'i tshe dge slong thams cad la bza' ba dang / btung ba 'byor tshogs zhes smras la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rjes su thugs rang ba ma gsungs pas/ de gang gis kyang ci yang mi byin nas
237a3(mdo sde): de khros te phyir byung nas 'di snyam du/ kye ma sdug bsngal ba bdag la gang gis ci yang ma byin pa ni/ dge sbyong bdag nyid ngan pa rnams te/ sems nye bar zhi ba ma yin zhing / snying rje med
237a4(mdo sde): la byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa dag go/ / gang de dag la byin yang 'bras bu med pa de lta bu dag la sbyin par byed pa ni/ sbyin bdag blun pa ste/ gal te bdag rgyal por gyur na/
237a5(mdo sde): thams cad kyi mgo lcags kyi 'khor los bcad do snyam du sems par gyur to// de nas de'i 'og tu dge slong thams cad la bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag 'byor tshogs zhes
237a6(mdo sde): byas shing / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rjes su thugs rung bar mdzad pa dang / gcig shos 'ongs par gyur to// de nas bza' ba dang / btung ba mang ba dang / bsod
237a7(mdo sde): ba thob nas/ de yid rangs te/ phyir byung nas 'di snyam du/ kye ma sdug bsngal ba bdag la gang dag gis bza' ba dang / btung ba mang ba dang / bsod pa sbyin pa ni dge sbyong
237b1(mdo sde): bdag nyid chen po rnams te/ snying brtse bar byed la sems nye bar zhi ba yin zhing byams pa'i bdag nyid can dag go// 'dis ni bdag zhag bdun du tshim par 'gyur bar bya'o// gang /
237b2(mdo sde): 'di dag la byin na/ 'bras bu che ba sbyin gnas chen po 'di lta bu bdag la sbyin par byed pa ni sbyin bdag chen po mkhas pa la ste legs so// gal te bdag rgyal por gyur na/ sangs
237b3(mdo sde): rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zhag bdun du/ bsnyen bskur thams cad kyis rim gror byed par gyur gcig snyam du sems par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
237b4(mdo sde): gdugs chod bsol nas/ gsang sder gyur ste/ phyag bcabs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo deng phyin cad bza' ba dang / btung ba
237b5(mdo sde): ma blangs pa nyid du rjes su yi rang ba brjod cig/ de nas spobs pa'i blo gros g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sman sngar 'dug go// bcom ldan 'das
237b6(mdo sde): kyis de la yang dag par dga' ba dang / yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang / yang dag par 'dzin du bzhug pa sngon du mdzad po'i chos kyi gtam/ sems can mang
237b7(mdo sde): bo'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs skyes par mdzad de/ gdan las bzhengs nas bzhud do// rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du gshegs nas/ de na bzhugs so// de nas
238a1(mdo sde): sdug bsngal ba de gnyis 'khor 'khor khyam khyam ste/ yul gzhan zhig du song nas pa zad tshu zad tsam gyi phyogs su nyal bar gyur to// der bsod nams kyi las
238a2(mdo sde): can de la steng gi nam mkha' la grib ma'i don du/ sprin gyi bla re glog dang rlung 'byung ba dang bcas pa rab tu gnas par gyur to// de'i tshe yul de na rgyal po gang yin pa de 'chi ba'i
238a3(mdo sde): dus byas so/ / de na gang rgyal srid la dbang bskur bar bya ba'i rgyal po'i mtshan dang ldan pa yang gzhan med do// de na tshong dpon dang grong mi dang / yul mi dang
238a4(mdo sde): blon po chen po dang / blon po dang / sgo ba dang / 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams ni/ mtshan mkhan dang / ltas mkhan dang / skar ma dang / bza'
238a5(mdo sde): spyod pa la ma mkhas pa la/ rgyal por 'gyur ba su yod ces brtson par gyur cing 'dri'o// des smras pa/ skyes bu dbul po mtshan dang ldan pa zhig yod do//
238a6(mdo sde): de ni rgyal por 'gyur ro// de nas de dag rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rgyal po la 'os pa rin thang che ba'i khri stan bzang po gser gyi rkang rten dang bcas pa dang / yu ba
238a7(mdo sde): nor bu las byas pa'i gdugs dkar po dang / yu ba gser las byas shing / nor bu dang ldan pa'i rnga ma'i bsil yab dang / spos chus bkang ba'i bum pa du ma dang
238b1(mdo sde): me tog dang / rgyan 'breng dang / gos dang / dbu rgyan dar thod dang bcas pa la sogs pa'i rgyan dang / spos kyis phur ma dang / slo ma dag thogs te/ sil snyan dang /
238b2(mdo sde): pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs dang bcas pa dag dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor nas byung ste/ kun nas de kun tu btsal to// ltas mkhan des sprin gyi tshogs kyis bka' ba'i
238b3(mdo sde): phyogs de mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang de dag la smras pa/ grogs po dag khyed cag gis sprin sngon po'i dkyil 'khor gyis khebs pa dga' zhing bsil ba'i phyogs de mthong ngam de dag
238b4(mdo sde): gis smras pa/ grogs po mthong ngo // des smras pa/ de na rgyal po'i mtshan dang ldan pa'i skyes bu de 'dug ste/ de'i bsod nams kyi las kyis grib ma'i don du sprin de dag
238b5(mdo sde): 'dus so/ / de nas de dag dong nas/ sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs kyi sgras sbran te/ btud de la 'di skad ces smras so// dbang bskur ba bzhes la rgyal por gyur cig
238b6(mdo sde): des smras pa/ kho bo lta bu rgyal po'i 'os ga la yin+da/ de dag gis smras pa/ bsod nams kyi las can khyod de skad ma zer bar/ khyod gdon mi za bar rgyal po bya dgos so//
238b7(mdo sde): spras pa/ de bzhin du gyur cig/ de nas de dag gis gser gyi rkang rten la rkang pa bzhag pa de stan bzang po la 'dug tu bcug nas/ bkra shis thams cad kyis rgyas par byed cing /
239a1(mdo sde): dbang bskur te/ dbu rgya na dar thod can la sogs pa'i rgyan rnams kyis brgyan nas/ shing rta'i mgo logs su gdugs chen po bsgreng ste/ btsugs shing lu
239a2(mdo sde): ba gser las byas pa nor bu can gyi rnga ma'i bsil yab bdag gis g.yob cing / lha rgyal bar gyur cig/ rgyal bar gyur cig ces/ kun nas mngon par bstod de rgyal po'i pho brang
239a3(mdo sde): 'khor du khrid do/ / de nas rgyal po'i shing rta de bsgyur ba'i 'khor los bkren pa gcig shos gnyid log pa'i mgo chod do// de nas bsod nams kyi las can de yang
239a4(mdo sde): rgyal srid la gnas par gyur to/ / de'i rgyal srid de yang yams kyi nang med pa dang / gnod pa med pa dang / 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang
239a5(mdo sde): skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang bar gyur to// rgyal po'i ming gi yon tan thams cad 'byor cing ldan par gyur la/ dga' mgur spyod pa de 'di snyam du/ 'di gang gi mthu yin/
239a6(mdo sde): bdag gi rgyal srid skal ba bzang po dang ldan par 'di gang gis byung bar gyur snyam pa dang / de sangs rgyas kyi mthus sngon gyi las sngon par 'du byas pa de thams cad rjes su dran no//
239a7(mdo sde): yang dag par dran nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag sems can mang po gzhan rnams la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ tshur gshegs su gsol zhes po
239b1(mdo sde): nya zhig btang ngo / / pho nya btang nas kyang rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar dang / rang gi khyim gyi bar du bar der/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thams cad dang ldan pa'i lam chag chag btab cing
239b2(mdo sde): phyag dar byas te/ me tog chal par bkram nas/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rta babs btsugs shing pog spor dag gis bdugs nas/ mngon par brgyan te/
239b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyang de la thugs brtse ba'i slad du gshegs so// de nas rgyal po de grong khyer gyi mi dang / yul gyi mi dang bcas shing blon po chen po blon po dang / sgo ba dang / 'khor
239b4(mdo sde): gyi tshogs dang bcas pas su'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la me tog dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye mas bsgos pa'i slob ma dpag tu med
239b5(mdo sde): bas mchod de/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i zhabs la lus thams cad kyi phyag 'tshal nas/ 'khor dang bcas te bcom ldan 'das la bla ma la gus pa dang / gces par
239b6(mdo sde): byed pa chen po mchog gis/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu rang gi khyim gyi rlung rin po che chen po thams cad kyis brgyan pa skyed mos tshal chen po yongs
239b7(mdo sde): su bskor bar gshegs su gsol nas/ zhag bdun du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro byas so// de nas rgyal po des bcom ldan 'das gdugs chod
240a1(mdo sde): gsol nas/ / ang sder gyu ste phyag bcabs par rig nas/ chos nyan pa'i phyir g.yog 'khor dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ 'di
240a2(mdo sde): skad ces kyang gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dma' ba dang dbul ba lags na/ bdag gis rgyul srid phun sum tshogs pa 'di ga las mchis logs/ bcom ldan
240a3(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer chen po na/ sbyin bdag chen po spobs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ des dus gzhan zhig na/ rang gi
