321b6(mdo sde): pa'i phyir te/ lhag par byed pa'i rang bzhin las lhag par byed pa med pa gzhan med pas lhag par byed pa'i rang bzhin nyid lhag pa byed pa med pa ste/ lhag par byed pa'i rang bzhin gyi lhag par byed pa
321b7(mdo sde): med pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad lhag par byed pa med pa'o// bdag ni 'degs pa dang gzhag pa dang / dbyer med pa'i 'degs pa dang / gzhag pa med pa shes pa la gnas kyis/
322a1(mdo sde): gzhan dag kyang 'degs pa dang gzhag pa dang / dbyer med pa gdegs pa med cing gzhag pa med pa shes pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te
322a2(mdo sde): de la gdegs pa dang / gzhag pa dang / dbyer med pa kha degs pa med cing gzhag pa med pa ni gdegs pa dang gzhag pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'degs pa med
322a3(mdo sde): pa dang gzhag pa med pa ni/ 'degs pa dang gzhag pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma yin pa'i rang bzhin/ 'degs pa dang gzhag pa'i rang bzhin las/ 'degs pa med cing gzhag pa
322a4(mdo sde): med pas 'degs pa dang gzhag pa'i rang bzhin nyid 'degs pa med cing gzhag pa med pa ste/ 'degs pa dang gzhag pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyi 'degs pa dang gzhag pa med pa shes pa
322a5(mdo sde): des/ chos thams cad gdegs pa dang gzhag pa med pa'o// bdag ni blang ba dang dor ba dang / dbyer med pa/ blang ba med cing dor ba med pa shes pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag
322a6(mdo sde): kyang blang ba dang dor ba dang dbyer med pa shes pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par gyur te/ de la blang ba dang dor ba dbyer med pa/ blang ba med cing dor ba med pa ni blang ba dang
322a7(mdo sde): dor ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blang ba med cing dor ba med pa ni blang ba dang dor ba'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir te/ blang ba dang dor ba'i rang bzhin las
322b1(mdo sde): blang ba med cing dor ba med pa gzhan med pas/ blang ba dang dor ba med pa'i rang bzhin nyid blang ba dang dor ba med pa'o// blang ba dang dor ba'i rang bzhin gyis blang ba med cing dor ba med pa
322b2(mdo sde): shes pa des/ chos thams cad blang ba med cing dor ba med pa ste/ 'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dang yongs su sbyong bar
322b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'o/ / 'jam dpal gzhan yang dbug 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bdag ni 'dus
322b4(mdo sde): byas dang dbyer med pa/ 'dus ma byas shes pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang 'dus byas dang dbyer med pa/ 'dus ma byas shes pa la dgod do zhes dbug 'byin pa rnyed par
322b5(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ de la 'dus byas dang dbyer med pa 'dus ma byas ni 'dus byas kyis rang bzhin gang yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dus ma byas na 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin las gzhan
322b6(mdo sde): ma yin pa'i phyir te/ 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin las 'dus ma byas gzhan med pas 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin nyid 'dus ma byas te/ 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin 'dus ma byas shes pa des
322b7(mdo sde): chos thams cad 'dus ma byas so/ / bdag ni dngos po dang dbyer med pa dngos po med pa shes pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang dngos po dang dbyer med pa dngos po med pa shes pa la
323a1(mdo sde): dgod do zhes dbug 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la dngos po dang dbyer med pa dngos po meng pa ni dngos po'i rang bzhin gang yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/

329b3(mdo sde): med pa/ mtshan ma med pa'i shes pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang mtshan ma dang dbyer med pa mtshan ma med pa'i shes pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la

329b6(mdo sde): cad mtshan ma med pa'o/ / bdag ni bsgom pa dang dbyer med pa bsgom pa med pa'i shes pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang bsgom pa dag dang dbyer med pa bsgom pa med pa'i shes pa la

331a4(mdo sde): ni log par lta ba dang dbyer med pa dag yang dag pa'i lta ba shes pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan yang log par lta ba dang dbyer med pa yang dag pa'i lta ba shes pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed

343a4(mdo sde): dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la byang chub kyi sems ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ni byang chub sems pa'i bslab pa la gnas
343a5(mdo sde): kyis/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ni thams cad las yang dag par

355b5(mdo sde): gzhan med pas/ nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin nyid ye shes yin te/ ye shes des ye shes de nyid bsal bar mi bya'o// dper na mdzub mo'i rtse mo de la nyid kyis mdzub mo'i rtse mo de nyid la
355b6(mdo sde): reg par mi rung ba de ltar ye shes de nyid kyis de nyid gsal bar mi bya'o/ / bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa yang ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi rtag pa ma yin no zhes bya ba la
355b7(mdo sde): zhugs kyis/ / gzhan dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa yang ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi rtag pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba la gzung ngo zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/
356a1(mdo sde): de la de bzhin gshegs par rtag pa yang ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba ni rlom sems kyi ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro// bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis
356a2(mdo sde): mi khyab pa'o zhes bya ba'i ye shes 'di la zhugs kyis/ gzhan dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o zhes bya ba'i ye shes 'di la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/
356a3(mdo sde): de la de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni sems can gdul ba ci lta ba dang / bsam pa ji lta ba de bzhin du rnam par bzhag pa las mi 'da' ba gang yin pa'o// bdag ni gzugs mtshan nyid
356a4(mdo sde): med do zhes bya ba la zhugs kyis/ gzhan dag kyang gzugs mtshan nyid med do zhes bya ba la gzung ngo zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs ni mtshan nyid med pa'i rang

356b3(mdo sde): pa'o/ / bdag ni ye shes kyi tshogs la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang ye shes kyi tshogs la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la ye shes kyi tshogs ni stong pa nyid la mos pa
356b4(mdo sde): gang yin pa'o/ / bdag ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba las 'byung ba'i las la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang shes rab kyi rtsa ba las byung ba'i las la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/
356b5(mdo sde): de la shes rab kyi rtsa ba las byung ba'i las ni bdag nyid ches dkar po la gnas pa gang yin pa'o// yang shes rab kyi rtsa ba las byung ba'i las ni gzhan shes rab la dgod pa gang yin pa'o// bdag
356b6(mdo sde): ni ting nge 'dzin la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang ting nge 'dzin la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la ting nge 'dzin ni sems med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par gang yin pa'o// bdag
356b7(mdo sde): ni so so yang dag par rtog pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang so so yang dag par rtog pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la so so yang dag par rtog pa ni las dang bya ba la 'jug
357a1(mdo sde): pa gang yin pa ste/ 'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o// 'jam dpal gzhan yang
357a2(mdo sde): dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dang po yongs su spong bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag ni dbu ma'i lam shes pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang
357a3(mdo sde): dbu ma'i lam shes pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la dbu ma'i lam ni mtha' rnam par dag pa shes pa gang yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtha'i rang bzhin las dbu ma'i lam
357a4(mdo sde): gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir te/ mtha'i rang bzhin las dbu ma'i lam gzhan med pas/ mtha'i rang bzhin nyid dbu ma'i lam mo// bdag ni chos thams cad rtag pa'o zhes bya ba la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag
357a5(mdo sde): kyang chos thams cad rtag pa'o zhes bya ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la chos thams cad rtag pa ni mtha' dang dpung med pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad mtha' dang dpung
357a6(mdo sde): med pa ni 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir te/ 'dus byas kyis rang bzhin las mtha' dang dpung med pa gzhan med pas/ 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin nyid mtha' dang dpung med pa'o// mtha' dang
357a7(mdo sde): dpung med pa gang yin pa de ni rtog pa brtan pa ther zugs pa'o/ / bdag ni sangs rgyas la mchod pa bye brag tu mngon par 'phags pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas la mchod pa bye brag tu
357b1(mdo sde): mngon par 'phags pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la sangs rgyas la mchod pa bye brag tu mngon par 'phags pa ni theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la
357b2(mdo sde): bsnyen cing bsten pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed cing snyed pa dang / bkur sti byas te/ cis nus kyis theg pa chen po yang dag par skyed cing sbyin pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ni chos thams cad 'dus ma byas so/
357b3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang chos thams cad 'dus ma byas so bya ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la chos thams cad 'dus ma byas zhes bya ba de ni 'dus ma
357b4(mdo sde): byas kyi tshig go/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin las 'dus ma byas gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir te/ 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin las 'dus ma byas gzhan med pas/ 'dus ma byas kyi rang
357b5(mdo sde): bzhin nyid 'dus ma byas te/ 'dus ma byas kyi rang bzhin 'dus ma byas shes pa des chos thams cad 'dus ma byas pa'o// bdag ni chos thams cad stong ngo zhes bya ba la zhugs kyis/ gzhan dag
357b6(mdo sde): kyang chos thams cad stong ngo zhes bya ba la gzung ngo zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la stong pa nyid ni lta bar gyur pa gang yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid ni lta bar gyur pa'i
357b7(mdo sde): rang bzhin las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir te/ lta bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin las stong pa nyid gzhan med pas/ lta bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin nyid stong pa nyid do// lta bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin nyid shes pa
358a1(mdo sde): des chos thams cad stong pa ste/ 'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o// 'jam
358a2(mdo sde): dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag ni chos thams cad mthong bar dka' ba la
358a3(mdo sde): gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang chos thams cad mthong bar dka' ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la chos thams cad mthong bar dka' ba ni rgyu dang rkyen gyi rang bzhin yin
358a4(mdo sde): pa'i phyir ro/ / bdag ni chos thams cad rtogs par dka' ba la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang chos thams cad rtog par dka' ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la chos thams
358a5(mdo sde): cad rtogs par dka' ba ni dmigs pa med pa dang / yid la byed pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir ro// bdag ni chos thams cad rig par dka' ba la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang chos
358a6(mdo sde): thams cad rig par dka' ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la chos thams cad rig par dka' ba ni shis pa dang shes bya mnyam pa nyid du rtog pa'i phyir ro// bdag
358a7(mdo sde): ni chos thams cad rnyog pa med pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang chos thams cad rnyog pa med pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la chos thams cad rnyog pa med pa ni shin tu
358b1(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ / bdag ni chos thams cad ma zad pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang chos thams cad mi zad pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la chos thams
358b2(mdo sde): cad mi zad pa ni dpe dang dper bya ba'i ngo bo nyid ma yin pa'i phyir te/ 'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o// 'jam

358b5(mdo sde): nyid du 'jug pa gang yin pa'o/ / bdag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mi phyed pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mi phyed pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par
358b6(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ de la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mi byed pa ni nang rnam par dag pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ni ma rig pa dang 'du byed mi phyed pa shes pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang ma rig pa dang 'du
358b7(mdo sde): byed mi phyed pa shes pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma rig pa ni 'du byed kyi rang bzhin las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir ro// gal te 'du byed rnams las ma
359a1(mdo sde): rig pa gzhan ma yin du zin na 'du byed rnams rgyu med pa can du 'gyur ro/ / ci ste ma rig pa las 'du byed rnams gzhan ma yin/ de lta na ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyu dang
359a2(mdo sde): 'bras bu 'grogs par 'gyur ro/ / bdag ni chos thams cad mi rtog pa'o zhes bya ba la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang chos thams cad mi rtag pa'o zhes bya ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed
359a3(mdo sde): par 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi rtag pa nyid rtag pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir te/ rtag pa'i rang bzhin las mi rtag pa gzhan med pas/ rtag pa'i rang bzhin nyid mi rtag pa'o//
359a4(mdo sde): bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma skyes ma 'gags pa'o zhes bya ba la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ma skyes ma 'gags pa'o zhes bya ba dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin/
359a5(mdo sde): pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa ma skyes ma 'gags pa ste gnyis po med pa'i phyir ro// 'di lta ste dper nam mkha' ni ma skyes pa ma 'gags pa mtha' dang dpung med pa yin mong
359a6(mdo sde): kyi/ 'on kyang dmigs pa'i dbang gis 'dis ni khab kyi bu gu'o// 'di ni bum pa'i nang ngo // 'di ni nam mkha' tshad med pa'o zhes rab 'bring dang tha mar snang yang ma skyes ma 'gags pa'i phyir/
359a7(mdo sde): nam mkha' la rab 'bring dang tha ma med do// nam mkha' na mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyis/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir te/ de mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba 'di lta bu
359b1(mdo sde): 'di byung ngo / / 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang ma skyes ma 'gags pa mtha' dang dpung med pa yin mod kyis/ 'on/
359b2(mdo sde): kyang de sems can gyi bsam pa'i dbang gis/ sems can gyi bsam pa rab 'bring tha ma rnams la 'di ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o// 'di ni sems can thams
359b3(mdo sde): cad kyi go skabs yod pa theg pa chen po zhes bya ba tha dad pa 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyis/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir/ de mi rtog cing lhun gyis
359b4(mdo sde): grub par bya ba 'di 'byung ngo / / 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma'i 'od ni gnas dang / dmigs pa'i dbang gis grib ma sna tshogs su 'gyur yang nyi ma'i 'od ni ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i
359b5(mdo sde): phyir mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang dmigs pa'i
359b6(mdo sde): dbang gis ye shes tha dad pa sna tshogs su 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir/ de mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub
359b7(mdo sde): par bya ba 'di lta bu 'di 'byung ngo / / 'di ni theg pa 'am theg pa ma yin pa ni gang yang med de/ 'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po
360a1(mdo sde): yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o/ / 'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/
360a2(mdo sde): lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag ni sems can gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa sel ba la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang sems can gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa gsel ba la dgod do zhes dbugs
360a3(mdo sde): 'byon pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la kun nas nyon mongs pa ni lus la gnod pa dang / sems la gnod pa'o// bdag ni chos snang ba'i sgo'i shes rab la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang chos sno
360a4(mdo sde): ba'i sgo'i shes rab la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal de la chos snang ba'i sgo'i shes rab ni chos bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta
360a5(mdo sde): ste/ dad pa dang / bag yod pa dang / bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa ste/ 'jam dpal chos bzhi po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos snang ba'i sgo'i shes rang
360a6(mdo sde): 'byung bar 'gyur te/ chos snang ba'i sgo'i shes rab kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba thams cad gcod par 'gyur ro// bdag ni ye shes snang ba'i

361a5(mdo sde): pa ma yin/ lhag par mi byed pa ma yin/ dngos po ma yin/ dngos po med pa ma yin/ 'dus byas ma yin/ 'dus ma byas ma yin/ mtshan nyid ma yin/ mtshan nyid med pa ma yin

363a1(mdo sde): brtan pa ni sdom pa la spyod pa gang yin pa ste/ 'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o//

363a3(mdo sde): dag kyang rtog pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la rtogs pa ni mdo las 'byung ba'i dgongs pa khong du chud pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ni shes rab la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag
363a4(mdo sde): kyang shes rab la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la shes rab ni 'dus ma byas kyis chos rnams la dbyer med par mkhas pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ni tshigs la gnas kyis

363a6(mdo sde): gcod pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur/ de la yongs su gcod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bdag ni thabs mkhas pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang

377a4(mdo sde): med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do/ / de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grang
377a5(mdo sde): med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do/ / de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho ga
377a6(mdo sde): med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do/ / de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi smon lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag
377a7(mdo sde): bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do/ / de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyis brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan
377b1(mdo sde): ba gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do/ / de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyis rdul snyed kyi dbugs 'byin pa snyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa

377b3(mdo sde): gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do/ / de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa

377b5(mdo sde): gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do/ / de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can gyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho mang+gA
377b6(mdo sde): med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do/ / de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rgya ma
377b7(mdo sde): grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do/ / de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul rnyed kyi bskal pa la 'jug pa rgya mchog pa
378a1(mdo sde): med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa thogs pa med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes brnyes pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal
378a2(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ brag phug gi nang nas/ brag cha sems can gyi sgra rnam pa mang po 'jug pa sa/ sgra skad gzhan dang gzhan mtha' yas pa 'byung ste/ brag cha ni mi rtog rnam par
378a3(mdo sde): mi rtog mod kyis 'on kyang / ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir de mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs
378a4(mdo sde): pa la yang / sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba dang / 'dul ba ci lta ba de dag gis de lta bu'i skad du ston pa 'byung bar shes te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog par rnam par mi rtog
378a5(mdo sde): mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir/ de mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i
378a6(mdo sde): mkhyen pa thogs pa med pa/ mngor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan pa mi nus so// 'jam dpal de la de bzhin
378a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa/ khyu mchog tu gyur pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khas sa rab 'byams thams cad du
378b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re re yang thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha' khyab par 'gengs te/ sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa khru/
378b2(mdo sde): mchog tu gyur pas phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlob pa'o// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod spu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du
378b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re rer yang thog pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha' khyab par 'gengs pa/ sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa khyu mchog tu gyur pa/ phyi
378b4(mdo sde): ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlobs pa'o/ / 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan re re yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du
378b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re re yang thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha' khyab par 'gengs pa/ sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa/ khyA
378b6(mdo sde): mchog tu gyur pas phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlobs pa'o/ / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpe byad bzang po phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyis khams rab 'byams thams cad
378b7(mdo sde): du 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re rer yang thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha' khyab par 'gengs pa/ sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa khyu mchog
379a1(mdo sde): tu gyur pas/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlobs pa'o// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu'i khung bu re re yang thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med//
379a2(mdo sde): pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha' khyab par 'gengs pa sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa khyu mchog tu gyur pas/ phyi ma'i mthe'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlob pa'o// de
379a3(mdo sde): bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i yo byad thams cad kyang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re rer yang thogs pa
379a4(mdo sde): med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha' khyab par 'gengs pa/ sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa khyu mchog tu 'gyur bas/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal
379a5(mdo sde): par byin gyis brlob pa'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir te/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa ni smon lam gyi stobs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro// /
379a6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa khyu mchog tu gyur pa mngon bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlab
379a7(mdo sde): kyang bstan par mi nus so/ / 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun nas mngon tu 'gyur ba ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams rerare
379b1(mdo sde): dang / gling re re dang / rdul phra rab re re la ste/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi phyogs re re la byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'khod pa ni rab tu mang gis/ 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i
379b2(mdo sde): rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re re rgya mtsho grangs med pa dag gis rdul phra rab ni ches nyung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni sems can dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
379b3(mdo sde): dang / gling dang / ri rab dang / ri rab chen po dang / khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dang / grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal
379b4(mdo sde): po'i pho brang 'khor dang / 'bab chu dang / 'tshe'u dang / 'tshe bran dag gang la yang gnod pa dang / sgrib pa med de/ sngon ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin du bya ba dag 'jug ste/
379b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'dres chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// bsam pa ci lta ba dang / 'dul ba ji lta ba'i lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
379b6(mdo sde): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phyo chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang 'di ltar
379b7(mdo sde): kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa gnya' shing gang tsam na zhugs par mngon du mthong ngo / / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste//
380a1(mdo sde): dper na/ zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes bco lnga'i nam phyed kyi dus na/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang bu mo thams cad kyis zla
380a2(mdo sde): ba'i dkyil 'khor mdun na 'dug par 'thong yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir mi rtog cing / ldan
380a3(mdo sde): kyis grub par bya ba 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byung ngo / / 'jam dpa la de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'bums thams cad kyi sems
380a4(mdo sde): can bsam pa ci lta ba dang / 'dul ba ci lta ba de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa mdun na bzhugs par mthong yang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on
380a5(mdo sde): kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir/ mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun nas mngon du gyur pa
380a6(mdo sde): mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing yongs su sbyong
380a7(mdo sde): ba la mi 'jigs pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad kyi 'jig rte gyi khams re re dang / rdul phra rab kyi rdul phra re re la 'jig rten
380b1(mdo sde): gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul skyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la 'jug go/ / de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la ni bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i
380b2(mdo sde): ye shes kyis rnams par sbyong ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la ni ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo // 'jig rten gyi
380b3(mdo sde): khams rgya mtsho la ni pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag
380b4(mdo sde): bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni gzungs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo // 'jig rten gyi
380b5(mdo sde): khams rgya mtsho la la ni ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs med
380b6(mdo sde): pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par spyong ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par
380b7(mdo sde): sbyong ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni
381a1(mdo sde): smon lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par spong ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni brtson 'grus brtsom pa rgya mtsho grangs/
381a2(mdo sde): med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni dbugs rnyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par
381a3(mdo sde): sbyong ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
381a4(mdo sde): la la ni/ / de de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i ye shes bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sems can gyi bsam pa
381a5(mdo sde): dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs
381a6(mdo sde): med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par spyong ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i ye shes bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam
381a7(mdo sde): par sbyong ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni dus gsum bstan pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni
381b1(mdo sde): dus gsum 'gru ba rgya ma grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par spyong ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni skyo bar sems bskyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i
381b2(mdo sde): breg bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par spod ngo do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni dbyer med pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye zag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par spong ngo //
381b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa ni gnas gang nas kyang mi g.yo'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi g.yo ba'i ye shes brnyes pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
381b4(mdo sde): yongs su sbyong ba la 'jigs pa mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so// 'jam dpal de bzhin
381b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i sku mtha' yas pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re re la ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams lnga
381b6(mdo sde): bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyis khams rgya ma morgya stong sangs med pa'i rdul tha rab kyi rdul snyed rnams kyi ni rab tu nyung gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub
381b7(mdo sde): sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho ni ches mang ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rdul rnams ni rab tu
382a1(mdo sde): @nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa'i rgya mtsho bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang
382a2(mdo sde): gzhan dag gis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra
382a3(mdo sde): rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gis/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho ye shes kyis tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang
382a4(mdo sde): gzhan gyis/ sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i
382a5(mdo sde): rdul snyed phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gis/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sem sa dpa' rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang
382a6(mdo sde): gzhan gyis/ sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra
382a7(mdo sde): rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa'i rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis/ sangs rgyas
382b1(mdo sde): la lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab
382b2(mdo sde): tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa'i rgya mtsho gzungs rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan dag gis sangs rgyas la lta ba
382b3(mdo sde): mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/
382b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyis dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis/ sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur
382b5(mdo sde): pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo / / 'jig rten gyis khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyis khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang
382b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan dag gis/ sangs rgyas la lta ba
382b7(mdo sde): mngon du 'gyur ba thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo / / 'jig rten gyis khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyis khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams
383a1(mdo sde): ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs
383a2(mdo sde): med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du 'gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo / / 'jig rten gyis khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
383a3(mdo sde): mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho mngon rab shes pa rgya mtsho
383a4(mdo sde): grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis/ sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa dag ni ches mang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
383a5(mdo sde): mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa'i rgya mtsho smon lam gyi bye brag
383a6(mdo sde): rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis/ sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi
383a7(mdo sde): khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa'i rgya mtsho bsod nams
383b1(mdo sde): k yi tshogs kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin brlab kyis de bzhin gshegs
383b2(mdo sde): pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo / / 'jig rten gyis khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni
383b3(mdo sde): rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho ye shes kyi tshogs kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag ye shes kyi
383b4(mdo sde): tshogs kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin brlabs kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams lnga
383b5(mdo sde): bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems
383b6(mdo sde): dpa' rgya mtsho pha rol tu phyin pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag pha rol tu phyin pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin brlabs kyis/ de bzhin
383b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan thob pa dag ni chos mang ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams
384a1(mdo sde): ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa'i rgya mtsho sa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag sa'i
384a2(mdo sde): bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin brlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams lnga
384a3(mdo sde): bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub
384a4(mdo sde): sems dpa'i rgya mtsho gzungs kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de bzhin gzungs kyis bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ de bzhin
384a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams
384a6(mdo sde): ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho ting nge 'dzin gyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag/ ting nge 'dzin
384a7(mdo sde): gyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams lnga
384b1(mdo sde): bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyis rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub
384b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgya mtsho rnam par thar pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag ni rnam par thar pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ / de bzhin
384b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams
384b4(mdo sde): ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho so so yang dag par rig pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag so so yang
384b5(mdo sde): dag par rig pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo // 'jig rten
384b6(mdo sde): gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub
384b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgya mtsho mngon par shes pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag mngon par shes pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ / de bzhin
385a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul
385a2(mdo sde): phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho smon lam gyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag smon
385a3(mdo sde): lam gyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du
385a4(mdo sde): sbyar te/ rten pa rnams dang / ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes rnams dang / spyod pa rnams dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang / brtson 'grus brtsom pa rnams dang /
385a5(mdo sde): dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa rnams dang / sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa rnams dang / tshul khrims rnams dang / lung bstan pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'
385a6(mdo sde): dag la 'jug pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rnams dang / sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug pa rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa
385a7(mdo sde): rnams dang / bskal pa la 'jug pa rnams dang / dus gsum bstan pa rnams dang / dus gsum la 'jug po rnams dang / mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa rnams dang / ye shes
385b1(mdo sde): dbyer med pa rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang / sangs rgyas ston pa rnams dang / kun tu bzang po'i sems bskyed pa rnams dang / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos rnams
385b2(mdo sde): dang / snying rje chen po thob pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen rnams dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la gus par bya ba'i sems bskyed pa rnams dang / yongs su dag pa
385b3(mdo sde): rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / ye shes rjes su rtogs pa rnams dang / so sor rtog pa rnams dang / stobs bskyed pa rnams dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul
385b4(mdo sde): gyi lam rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma chad pa rnams dang / kun tu bzang po rnams dang / spongs pa rnams dang / ye shes kyi dbang rnams dang / gnas med pa rnams dang //
385b5(mdo sde): sem sa mnyam pa nyid dang / ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa rnams dang / sprul pa rnams dang / byin gyi rlabs pa rnams dang / dbugs 'byin pa chen po rnyed pa rnams dang / zab mo
385b6(mdo sde): la 'jug pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la brten pa rnams dang / sems bskyed pa rnams brtan pa rnams dang / the tsom thams cad gcod pa rnams dang / sems bskye ba rnams/
385b7(mdo sde): dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams dang / ldem po ngag la mkhas pa rnams dang / ye shes rnam par byed pa la mkhas pa rnams dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / zang par
386a1(mdo sde): gyi skye mched rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / rig pa rnams dang / rnam par grol ba rnams dang /
386a2(mdo sde): bskyed mos tshal rnams dang / rin po che bkod pa rnams dang / mi bskyed pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa mi gtong ba la gnas pa rnams dang / rgya
386a3(mdo sde): mtsho lta bu'i ye shes la 'jug pa rnams dang / rin po che lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i gnas rnams dang / rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa rnams dang / theg pa chen po'i go/
386a4(mdo sde): cha rnams dang / rtsom pa med chen po rnams dang / rtsom pa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa rnams dang / mi phyed pa'i dad pa rnams dang / lung bstan pa rnams dang / dge
386a5(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba rnams dang / ye shes khong du chud pa rnams dang / sems bskyed pa rgya che ba mtha' dang / dpung med pa rnams dang / gter rnams dang /
386a6(mdo sde): sdom pa rnams dang / dbang rnam par sprul pa rnams dang / zhing rnam par sprul pa rnams dang / chos rnam par sprul pa rnams dang / smon lam rnam par sprul pa rnams dang
386a7(mdo sde): spyod yul rnam par sprul pa rnams dang / ye shes rnam par sprul pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnam par sprul pa rnam dang / rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa rnams dang / stobs
386b1(mdo sde): rnam par sprul pa rnams dang / rnam par rol pa rnams dang / yul rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa
386b2(mdo sde): rnams dang / lus rnams dang / lus kyi las rnams dang / gzugs rnams dang / ngag gis las rnams dang / sems rnams dang / sems bskyed pa rnams dang / sems
386b3(mdo sde): rgyas par byed pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / bsam pa rnams dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa rnams dang / sbyor ba rnams dang / mos pa rnams dang / 'jig rten gyis khams
386b4(mdo sde): su mos pa la 'jug pa rnams dang / bag chags rnams dang / len pa rnams dang / nan tan rnams dang / 'grub pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos nges pa rnams dang / theg pa
386b5(mdo sde): rnams dang / mi 'gyur ba rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i nges pa'i chos rnams dang / nges par 'byung ba'i lam rnams dang / skyes bu dam pa'i ming thob pa rnams dang / lam rnams dang /
386b6(mdo sde): lam gyi tshad rnams dang / lam gyi tshogs rnams dang / lam bsgoms pa rnams dang / lam bkod pa thams cad la'ang de bzhin du brjod par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam
386b7(mdo sde): par mi rtog go/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes brnyes pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni 'dzam bu gling gi snod chus
387a1(mdo sde): gang zhing sgrib pa med pa rnam par dag pa thams cad du snang ste/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos
387a2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i phyir/ rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba 'di lta bu 'di dag kyang byung ngo // 'jam dpe la de bzhin gshegs pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi kham
387a3(mdo sde): rab 'byams thams cad ni 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling re re'i sems can bsam pa ci lta ba dang / 'dul ba ci lta ba de dag gis/ cig char mthong ste de bzhin gshegs pa mi rtog
387a4(mdo sde): rnam par mi rtog mod kyis/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan zhing / sku thogs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag kyang byung ngo ngo/
387a5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtha' yas pa mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan pa mi nus so// /
387a6(mdo sde): / bam po lnga pa ste tha ma'o// 'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ni dpes bstan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes
387a7(mdo sde): bu mkhas pa gang dag dpe bshad pas rin shes par 'gyur ba yod pa'i phyir ro/ / 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na mchod dpag tshad 'bum phrag lnga pa bya rog gis btung du rung bar mu
387b1(mdo sde): dang kha tha chad du gyur pa pad+ma'i 'dab mas g.yogs pa zhig yod la/ de la skyes bu la la zhig gis lcags kyi shing rta phang lo rtsib ma stong yod pa/ nam mkha' lding gis mgyogs/
387b2(mdo sde): pa bas kyang lhag pa'i rta de lta bur mgyogs pas shing rta drangs te/ de ltar mgyogs pa'i shing rta drangs nas/ phang lo la yang chus mi reg/ rta'i mig pas kyang pad+ma'i 'dab ma
387b3(mdo sde): mi rol pa de lta bu'i shing rta des drangs pa las/ mtsho chen po de nas sprul dug pa steng du byung ste/ skad cig gang la shing rta bsgyur ba'i skad cig de la/ sprul dug pa des/ shing
387b4(mdo sde): rta de la na bcu'i bskor te/ 'jam dpal skad cig gang gis sprul dug pas shing rta de la na cig bskor ba'i skad cig de la/ dge slong kun dga' bos chos rnam pa bcu bstan pa
387b5(mdo sde): bshad don yang rig par byed do/ / dge slong kun dga' bos skad cig gang la chos gcig bstan pa bshad pa'i skad cig de la/ dge slong shA ri'i bu'i chos rnam pa bcu bstan pa
387b6(mdo sde): bshad nas don kyang rig par byed do/ / dge slong shA ri'i bus skad cig gang la chos gcig bstan pa bshad pa'i skad cig de la/ gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams
387b7(mdo sde): brgyad khri 'da'o/ / gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bus skad cig gang la/ 'jig rten gyi kham gcig 'das pa'i skad cig de la/ de bzhin gshegs pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig
388a1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad kyi gling re re na/ dga' ldan gyis gnas na gnas pa las 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang /
388a2(mdo sde): dka' spyod pa dang / sbyor ba dang / byang chub kyi snying por bzhud pa dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
388a3(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pa chen po dang / chos gnas pa dang / chos nub pa dus gcig tu ston to// mu stegs can gyi gnas kyi spyod pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs thams cad du yang dus
388a4(mdo sde): gcig tu sngon no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mkhyen pa thogs pa med pa dang / gzigs pa thogs pa med pa dbyer med pa dang / ma brten cing dbyer med pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpa
388a5(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dper na rin po che bai DUR+Ya las dngos po'i dbang gis gzhal du med pa'i bya ba dag 'byung ste/ bai DUR+Ya ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos
388a6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i phyir mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba gzhal du med pa dag 'byung ngo / / 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
388a7(mdo sde): las kyang sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i dbang gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du dus cig tu skad cig skad cig la/ mdzad pa gzhal du med
388b1(mdo sde): pa dag 'byung mod kyi/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ mi rtog cing spun gyi grub par mdzad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byung ste/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan
388b2(mdo sde): pa'i phyir ro/ / 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni 'dzam bu'i gling du snod chus bkang ba sgrib po med pa rnam par dag pa thams cad du
388b3(mdo sde): cig char du snang yang gnas nas mi g.yo'o/ / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab
388b4(mdo sde): 'byams thams cad du sems can sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par dag pa de dag bsam pa ci lta ba dang ci ltar 'dul ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni
388b5(mdo sde): dga' ldan gnas nas g.yos pa yang med mod kyi/ 'on kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du mdzad pa rtsom pa thams cad kyang snang ngo // de ci'i phyir
388b6(mdo sde): zhe na/ mi g.yo ba'i ye shes brnyes pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa rab 'bring dang tha ma'i dbang gi/ sems can rnams
388b7(mdo sde): kyi 'du byed rab 'bring dang tha ma dag 'byung ste/ 'du byed ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'du byed de dag ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir/ de mi rtog cing lhun gyis
389a1(mdo sde): grub par bya ba de lta bu de dag 'byung ngo / / de bzhin du rnam par smin pa thams cad 'bring dang rab kyi dbang gis sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa tha/
389a2(mdo sde): ma dang 'bring dang rab tu mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu
389a3(mdo sde): de dag kyang 'byung ngo / / 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na sprin las ro gcig pa'i char 'bab ste/ babs nas snod kyi bye brag gis kha dog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs su gyur te/ sprin ni
389a4(mdo sde): mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du de
389a5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ro gcig ste/ de sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i dbang gis chos kyi dbyings tha dad par snang yang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam
389a6(mdo sde): par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper
389a7(mdo sde): na nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po gang du 'byung ba der/ khrugs dang lcags kyi yo byad rnams mi 'byung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// 'jam
389b1(mdo sde): dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa gang du 'byung ba der/ me'i 'od rnams dang glog gi 'od rnams mi 'byung ngo // der nyi ma'i 'od rnams mi 'byung ngo // der nor bu'i 'od rnams
389b2(mdo sde): mi 'byung ngo / / der lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang /
389b3(mdo sde): tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i 'od rnams mi 'byung ngo // der rgyal po rnams kyi bka' mi 'byung ngo // der rigs bzhi rnams mi 'byung ngo // der mi khom par skye ba rnams
389b4(mdo sde): mi 'byung ngo / / der sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba rnams mi 'byung ngo // der mi dge bcu'i las kyi lam rnams
389b5(mdo sde): mi 'byung ngo / / der nyon mongs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo // der 'khrug pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo // der mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa dang /
389b6(mdo sde): 'tsho ba rnams ni mi 'byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir/ yul chags pa med pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog
389b7(mdo sde): cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo / / 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin
390a1(mdo sde): gyis rlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/ / 'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes ni/ 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams snga
390a2(mdo sde): bcu'i rdub snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i dang gling re rer skad cig skad cig la de bzhin
390a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku kha dog dang rnam par gnas pa dang / 'jug pa dus gcig tu 'byung ba dag ni ches mang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro//
390a4(mdo sde): 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes
390a5(mdo sde): lhun gyis grub pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang gling re rer sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan dang gzhan dag rtsom par sbyor ba dang / las dang bzo'i gnas thams
390a6(mdo sde): cad la sbyor ba dag 'byung ba ni ches mang ngo / / de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun
390a7(mdo sde): gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo / / 'jam dpal phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad na mu stegs can gyi gnas thams cad dang /
390b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las bya ba thams cad gang ci 'byung ba de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyis 'byung ngo //
390b2(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na sa la bsten sa la gnas nas/ sa bon thams cad dang rtswa dang shing gel ba
390b3(mdo sde): dang rtsi dang nags 'tshal 'phel zhing rgyas la yangs par 'gyur te/ sa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir/ rnam par mi rtog cing
390b4(mdo sde): lhun gyis grub par bya ba ste de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo / / 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la brten de bzhin gshegs pa la gnas nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig
390b5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad kyi mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa la sogs pa mu stegs can gyi gnas thams cad dang / sems can thams
390b6(mdo sde): cad kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'phel zhing rgyas la yangs par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtogs rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang
390b7(mdo sde): ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo / / 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na gang dag zug rngu 'byin
391a1(mdo sde): pa'i sman la reg pa de dag gi zug rngu thams cad 'byin te zug rngu 'byin pa'i sman ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan
391a2(mdo sde): pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo / / 'jam dpal de bzhin gang dag tha na de bzhin gshegs pa ri mor bris pa 'am gleg pa ma
391a3(mdo sde): la bris pa la reg kyang rung ste/ rgyu des de dag gis 'dod chags dang / zhes sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad zug rngu 'byin te/ de bzhin gshegs
391a4(mdo sde): pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo // 'jam
391a5(mdo sde): dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na rin po che'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi nor bu ni sems can thams cad kyi re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur te/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni mi
391a6(mdo sde): rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du lha
391a7(mdo sde): dang mi dang lha ma yin dang byang chub sems dpa' gang chos bstan pa gang 'dod pa de dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du 'gro zhing chos bstan pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa las nyan kyang
391b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo //
391b2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so// 'jam
391b3(mdo sde): dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad na 'jig rten gyi khams re
391b4(mdo sde): re dang / rdul phra rab re re dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag la 'jug ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang gling re re yang 'jig
391b5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag lnga bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs tha dad pa rgya mtsho

394a2(mdo sde): ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob kyang bstan par mi nus so/ / 'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun tu gzigs pa ni/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab

394a4(mdo sde): gtor gyis kyang gzigs so/ / de bzhin du mdzod spus kyang gzigs so// de bzhin du mtshan re res kyang gzigs so// de bzhin du dpe byad bzang po re res kyang gzigs so//
394a5(mdo sde): de bzhin du spu'i khung bu re res kyang gzigs so// de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad ni/ sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / bde 'gro

395a3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni tha dad pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa gling 'di na tha dad la/ gli

395a5(mdo sde): ris gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dud 'gro'i skyes gnas su skye ba 'di na tha dad la dud 'gro'o skyes gnas su skye ba gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no// de
395a6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa yi dgas kyi 'gro ba 'di na tha dad la/ yi dgas kyi 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba 'di na tha dad la/

395b6(mdo sde): 'dul ba de dag gi chos kyi tshul bstan pa de 'dra ba dag 'byung bar shes te/ de la lha dang mi dang byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gis ni gtsug tor la bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya

396b1(mdo sde): gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ / kha cig gis ni 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye/

396b4(mdo sde): kha cig gis ni mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so// lha dang mi dang byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gis ni gtsug tor nas

396b6(mdo sde): ba zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag gis/ sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la/ de bzhin du mdzod spu dang / de bzhin du mtshan ma re re dang / de bzhin du dpe byad bzang po re re dang /

397a1(mdo sde): ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlab kyang bstan par mi nus so/ / 'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba ni/ 'jam
397a2(mdo sde): dpal 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag na rdul phra rab kyi rdul yod pa dag ni rab tu nyung gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi
397a3(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dag ni ches mang ngo / / de la byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad tsam mo// byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad bcu dang / nyi shu dang
397a4(mdo sde): sum cu dang / bzhi bcu'o// byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad brgya'o// byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad brgya phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum du dang /
397a5(mdo sde): bzhi bcu'o// 'khor de nyid na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi ni dpag tshad stong ngo // 'khor de nyid na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad stong phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang /
397a6(mdo sde): su ma cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu'o// byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khran ni dpag tshad bye ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gis khrun ni dpag tshad bye ba phrag bcu dang / nyi shu
397a7(mdo sde): dang / sum nu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu'o// byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad bye ba phrag brgya'o// byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad bye ba phrag stong /
397b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' kha cag gi khrun ni dpag tshad bya ba stong phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi cu dang / lnga bcu yod de/ de dag thams cad kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
397b2(mdo sde): khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / gling thams cad na dus gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa nyis gyur du mthong ngo // 'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa bsam
397b3(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa gang la la zhig/ sems kyi skad cig skad cig la/ 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi gom pa dor bas/ steng gi phyogs logs su song ste/
397b4(mdo sde): gom pa re res kyang 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i 'jig rten rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor song la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug tshol zhing de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams
397b5(mdo sde): lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi bskal pa rgya mtshor song yang / der yang de bzhin gshegs pa nyis 'asrung du mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro//
397b6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so//
397b7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa spyod pa'i gnas rnams ni/ 'jam dpal phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams
398a1(mdo sde): cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re re dang rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems
398a2(mdo sde): can yongs su smin par mdzad pa spyod pa'i gnas rnams ni ches mang ngo / / 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re re dang / rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la/ de bzhin
398a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa spyod pa'i gnas ci snyed pa de bas ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las 'od gser gyi rgya mtsho 'byung zhing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
398a4(mdo sde): pa rjes su sgrogs pa dag ches mang ngo / / sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la/ de bzhin du gtsug tor dang / mdzod spu dang / mtshan re re dang / dpe byad bzang po re re dang /
398a5(mdo sde): spu'i khung bu re re nas/ zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho dag 'byung ste/ de la 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go// 'od
398a6(mdo sde): zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ / 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go// 'od zer rgya mtshol
398a7(mdo sde): cig ni sa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go// 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs
398b1(mdo sde): med pa rjes su sgrog go/ 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho grangs med
398b2(mdo sde): pa rjes su sgrog go/ 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni smon lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/
398b3(mdo sde): 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni dbugs 'byin pa snyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog

399a1(mdo sde): pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ / thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i
399a2(mdo sde): mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlob bo/ / 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa spyod pa'i gnas rnams mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas

399a6(mdo sde): kyi yongs su smin par mdzad do/ / sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni ye shes kyi tshogs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do//

400a6(mdo sde): can bskyed pa dbyer med pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ / de bzhin du sems can rnam par sprul pa dang / zhing rnam par sprul pa dang / chos rnam par sprul pa dang /

404a5(mdo sde): nyin cig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'di ni rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis
404a6(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / klog pa 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do// bzlog ste bsti stang ma
404a7(mdo sde): byas pa'i mi dge ba'i las kyang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o/ / phyugs kyi shing rta lta bus 'gro ba dang / ra'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba dang / glang po che'i shing rta lta bus 'gro
404b1(mdo sde): ba dang / zla ba dang nyi ma'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba dang / nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba 'ang / de bzhin te/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la
404b2(mdo sde): zhig gis/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi bar chad byas pa bas/
404b3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la/ za na dud
404b4(mdo sde): 'gro'i skyes gnas su rtogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad byed cing khro ba dang brnyes pa'i sems bskyed na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa grangs med par bskyed
404b5(mdo sde): do/ / 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi sems cad rnams kyi mig
404b6(mdo sde): phyung nas bdog pa thams cad phrogs pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gas/ byang chub sems dpa' la brnyas pa'i sems bskyed de/ gshe
404b7(mdo sde): 'dang mi snyan par smra ba dang rnyog par byed na/ de bas ches sdig pa mang du skyed do// 'jam dpal rig kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ byang chub sems dpa' la rkye
405a1(mdo sde): ci yang rung bas brnyas pa bskyed de spyod pa na/ de mi dge ba'i las des sem can dmyal ba ngu 'bod chen por lus dpag tshad lnga brgyar skye bar 'gyur te/ de la
405a2(mdo sde): mgo lnga brgya yod par 'gyur ro/ / de'i mgo re re la yang la lnga brgya yod par 'gyur/ de'i kha re re la yang lce lnga brgya yod par 'gyur/ lce re re la yang gshol lce lnga brgyas rmo bar 'gyur
405a3(mdo sde): ro/ / 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham rnams su skyes pa'i sems can thams cad la dbyug pa dang
405a4(mdo sde): mtshon cha yis bsnun te bdog pa thams cad phrogs pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/ byang chub sems dpa' la brnyas pa'i sem bskyed nas/ khro ba dang
405a5(mdo sde): gnod sems dang tha ba dang khros pa'i sems bskyed na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par bskyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ sdang
405a6(mdo sde): ba'i sems kyis sems can rnams la gnod par 'dod cing / 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ 'jig rte gyi khams re re dang gling re re na/ dgra bcom pa gang+gA
405a7(mdo sde): klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi srog bcad pa dang / rin po che'i mchod rten rin po che'i stegs bus yongs su bskor cing / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan gtsugs pa
405b1(mdo sde): / gang+gA'i bye ma snyed dag bshigs pa byas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig gis/ theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen
405b2(mdo sde): po nyid la sgro btags te brnyas pa'i sems bskyed nas/ rkyen cis kyang rung khro ba dang gshe ba dang / mi snyan pa zer ba dang / khyad dus gsod par byed na/ 'di ni de bas ches
405b3(mdo sde): sdig pa grangs med par bskyed do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las de bzhin gshegs pa nges par 'byung ba'i phyir te/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi gcod pa'i
405b4(mdo sde): phyir zhugs pa yin no/ / gang byang chub sems dpa' la skur pa des chos spangs pa yin no// chos kyang gzhan la chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan yang
405b5(mdo sde): gzhan ma yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid chos so// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig khros nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams
405b6(mdo sde): cad kyi sems can thams brtson ra mun nag dag tu bcug pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig khros te/ byang chub sems dpa' la rgyab kyis phyogs shing
405b7(mdo sde): 'dug nas/ ma rungs pa 'di mi blta'o// zhes zer na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par bskyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gi/
406a1(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad kyi bdog pa thams cad phrog pa bas/ gzhan gang zhig gis byang chub sem pa'i ci lta bu yang rung ba la smad na/
406a2(mdo sde): 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par bskyed do// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyis 'di lta ste/ mtho ba dang / yangs pa dang che bas/ ri thams cad
406a3(mdo sde): zil gyi mnan nas lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o/ / 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pas kyang / 'di lta ste/ mtho ba dang yangs pa dang che
406a4(mdo sde): bas/ phyogs bcu'i dag na byang chub sems dpa'achos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ma mos pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed yod pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyin pa lnga/
406a5(mdo sde): las byung ba/ bskal pa grangs med par bsags pa zil gyis mnon nas/ lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ phyogs
406a6(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems la bkod pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/ phung
406a7(mdo sde): po med pa'i gzhi la mos na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par bskyed do// 'jam dpal gal te sems can phung po med pa'i gzhi la mos par 'gyur ba bas/ 'jam
406b1(mdo sde): dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos la/ mos nas kyang yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / klog pa dang / klog du
406b2(mdo sde): 'jug pa dang / tha na glegs bam du bris pa la mos nas 'dzin par byed cing / mar me dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams kyis mchod
406b3(mdo sde): par byed na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par bskyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
406b4(mdo sde): thams cad du gtog pa'i sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dag/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa re re'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhal du med pa grang med/
406b5(mdo sde): nam dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chud gzon pa bas gzhan gang zhig gis/ byang chub sems

407a1(mdo sde): mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la gnod sems dang tha ba dang khro ba'i sems bskyed de/ gshe ba mi snyan par smras na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par

407a4(mdo sde): stang ma byas pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bsti stang ma byas pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' la bsti stang byas pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad la bsti stang byas pa yin no//

407a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya'am/ bye ba stong ngam/ bye ba brgya stong ngam/ gzhal du med pa grangs med pa dag yod la chos kyis rnam grangs 'di la ma mos na/ de dag gis las ni
407a7(mdo sde): rgyal po 'khrug par 'gyur ba 'am/ chus 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i lA sa ma// chom rkun gyis 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las sam/ mu ges 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i lA sam/ mes 'khrug par
407b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i las sam/ kla klos 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las su 'gyur ro// grong khyer chen po de na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sem dpa' yod na/ de'i las ni bskal pa
407b2(mdo sde): grangs med par mtshams med pa'i gnas su mi 'gyur/ grong khyer der 'khrug par mi 'gyur ro// gal te byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi las rgyal po 'khrug par 'gyur ba mi 'byung
407b3(mdo sde): chus 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las mi 'byung / chom rkun gyis 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las mi 'byung / mu ges 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las mi 'byung / mes 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i lA mi

407b5(mdo sde): dang / yi dgas su skye bar 'gyur ba yod na/ der 'khrug par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i las bskal pa grangs med pa brjod du med par mtshams med par skye bar 'gyur ba
407b6(mdo sde): dang / de'i las bskal pa bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cur ngan song myong bar 'gyur ba yang tshe 'di la myong ste 'khrug pas byang bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsod nams chen
407b7(mdo sde): po'i tshogs bsags pa'i phyir ro/ / 'jam da pa la 'di lta ste/ dper na brgyar dpag tshad brgya pa'i rdzing yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang la dug srang stong yang mi gdug
408a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chu'i phung po chen pos rab tu bye ba'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du bskul pa grangs med par sem
408a2(mdo sde): can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas kyi nang du gnas par 'gyur ba'i las rab tu mang ba yang rnam par smin par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chu'i phung
408a3(mdo sde): po chen pos rab tu bye ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po bsags pa'i phyir ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag nga byang chub sa
408a4(mdo sde): dpa' phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa dpag tu med pa grangs med pa rnams dang / lnga dang / mi dang / lA ma yin dang / dri zer bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste/ bco
408a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / 'phags pa dang pa'i stobs bskyed pa la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
